Her business is good enough for her to lead a decent life. She has seven children; two daughters and five sons. She is very motivated to provide them with a beautiful life and good education, food, and clothing. She has improved her business to meet the day-to-day expenses of life. 

It’s her 4th year with Kashf Foundation, and she is happily running her business through it's support. Now she requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves that she already has. She hopes to get an increase in the production capacity of milk, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, an iron, and fabric.

loans.name: Kajalrani

texts.en:
Kajalrani is a 56-year-old married lady and her husband, Sumanta, is 57 years old. They both belong to the small town of Mayanguri in Jalpaiguri. They have one child who is studying in class X (grade 10). Kajalrani is not educated, but can sign her name. Her husband has completed his education until X (grade 10). They both are running their poultry farm business but they are not earning so much profit from this business due to insufficient working capital. She needs a loan to buy more chicks, feed, medicine, etc. for her poultry farm to make her working capital strong so that she can earn more profit from her business. This business is profitable for them because the chicks grow very fast and once grown, they can sell their meat in the market and can earn easily from it.

They live in a pakka house (concrete house) but they do not having a personal sanitary toilet, so her dream is to make a personal sanitary toilet for them. They are experienced in the poultry field so they can understand the value of this business and can make profit easily. She is very much thankful to BJS and Kiva for funding her loan.

loans.use: To buy chicks, feed, medicine, etc for her poultry farm business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and an over machine.

loans.name: Parveen Group

texts.en:
Parveen is a 36-year-old hardworking and honest lady. She is a resident of Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She lives with her husband, two sons and one daughter. Both sons are enrolled at a local school. 

Parveen's husband is a barber. His monthly income is insufficient. He works hard to meet the family's needs and expenses. To help her husband, Parveen wants to start sewing clothes at home. She has tailoring training already. 

Due to a lack of funds, Parveen, as a member of a two-person lending group, requested a loan amount of 45,000 PKR from Kiva field partner, BRAC, for buying a sewing machine. She is hopeful that she can help her husband in this way. 

She wants her children to be well-educated citizens of Pakistan. Parveen is thankful to both Kiva and BRAC.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Shaheen's Group

texts.en:
Shaheen is a 38-year-old housewife. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan, and is the mother of three children. Her husband, the only wage-earning person in the family, delivers luggage, grass, and water by using a donkey cart. He values the donkey cart more than any other possession, because it can make money for him to sustain their family life. 

He needs capital for the maintenance of the donkey cart. However, due to financial constraints, he finds it difficult to pay for the maintenance.Therefore his wife Shaheen, as a member of a two-person lending group, has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can help her husband. With the profits, they will be able to have some savings. Shaheen is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: For the maintenance of the borrower's husband's donkey cart

loans.name: Asma

texts.en:
Asma, 42, has an IV standard (Grade 4) education.  She is a housewife, married to Mohammad Ali, 55 years old, who is a farmer.  He has received only a primary education. They have three children.  One of them is in college; the second one is in X standard (Grade 10).  The third one is engaged in agriculture. Asma and her family live in the small town of Dhupguri in Jalpaiguri district. They own a kachha house (made of mud and straw).

To help her husband, Asma wants to take a loan to buy good quality potato seeds and fertilizers for cultivating potatoes. They hope they can sell more products in the market and can expand their business and make a profit from it to upgrade their poor financial condition.

They are hopeful to buy a Maruti car with the profit they will get from their business. They will rent this car as another means of income.

loans.use: To buy potato seeds and fertilizers to grow poatoes

loans.name: Bashir Masih

texts.en:
Bashir Masih is 46 years old and the married father of five children.

The income generated through his present herd is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so he decided to enhance his business of milk sales. He has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good quality milk in his locality.

With the support of BRAC Pakistan, he has gradually improved his business. Currently he has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase another buffalo.

This will help him to increase his sales, which will ultimately help in generating more income for him. He is in his second loan cycle with a good repayment history.

Bashir Masih thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy an additional buffalo to get more milk to sell.

loans.name: Ioseb

texts.en: Ioseb is a 39-year-old married man. He lives in a small village of Lagodekhi district with his wife. The family is involved in agricultural activities. In particular, they have cows and sheep. Ioseb's wife looks after them and produces cheese to sell. In addition, Ioseb owns a small agricultural land, where tomatoes, cucumbers and maize are grown. He is a very hardworking man and does his best to ensure a good harvest. As the income is only seasonal, he decided to start his own business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables him to get a loan of $4,000 to purchase a minibus. After the minibus is purchased, he will start a trading business. He plans to purchase fruits and vegetables and then transport them to different villages to sell. This will increase the income of his family and with the increased income they will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a minibus

loans.name: Ayan Yousuf

texts.en: Ayan Yusuf is 21 years old. She studies at Alpha University College, in the faculty of Information Technology. She needs a laptop to write her graduation thesis book, prepare assignments and read lessons when given in soft copy. She cannot pay the money all at one time. She approached Kaaba MFI and Kaaba will provide her with a laptop that she can pay for in installments. After university, Ayan hopes to work as an IT officer.

loans.use: To buy a laptop for education purposes.

loans.name: Azymkul

texts.ru: Азымкул 61 год, вдова, после смерти мужа сама воспитывает сына и внука, а также ведет свое хозяйство.  У Азымкул - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Азымкул занимается животноводством, стартовав 11 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Азымкул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Азымкул обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Азымкул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение внука.
texts.en: Azymkul is 61 years old and a widow. After the death of her husband, she is taking care of her son and grandson on her own as well as running her farm. Azymkul has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Azymkul practices livestock breeding. She started this business 11 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Azymkul's hard work, she currently has 2 milk cows on her farm. Her monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Azymkul turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep to increase the size of her herd. Azymkul plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money for her grandson's future education.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Eika Patricia

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar  Erika en su peluquería, quien con su credikiva hizo adecuaciones a su local y logró un cambio muy positivo, porque tiene más clientela satisfecha, mayores ingresos, y poco a poco está aumentando su calidad de vida. Ella dice a sus financiadores: “Gracias por el apoyo brindado” y nuevamente se postula a un credikiva, porque quiere continuar perfeccionado el servicio,  climatizando su espacio de atención al cliente, en esta tierra cálida y para ello comprará un aire acondicionado y una puerta corrediza, que dará mas seguridad y amplitud al local, y con ello logrará su objetivo de hacer sentir confortables,  a todos los que lleguen a su negocio, incrementando su clientela. Y Esto es lo que justamente  hace de su credikiva una inversión exitosa.
texts.en:
Thank you for supporting Erika in her beauty salon. With her Kiva loans she renovated her salon and achieved a positive change as her increased clientèle is happy, she has higher income and she is slowly improving her quality of life. She says to her lenders: "Thank you for the support you have given me". 

Once again she has come to Kiva because she would like to continue perfecting her service, and acclimatizing her workspace to improve customer service. Due to the heat where she lives she will buy an air conditioning unit and a sliding door which will increase security and space in her salon. With these changes she will help her clients feel comfortable and will increase her clientèle. This is exactly what will make her Kiva loan successful.

loans.use: to buy air conditioning and a sliding door.

loans.name: Erkebu

texts.ru: Эркебу 56 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Эркебу - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Эркебу занимается животноводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, с покупки скота на 6,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Эркебу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, 1 лошадь, 3 овцы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 2,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Эркебу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Эркебу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку холодильника.
texts.en: Erkebu is 56 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising four children. Erkebu has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Erkebu practices livestock breeding. She started this business 14 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 6,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Erkebu's hard work, she currently has 3 milk cows, 1 horse and 3 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 2,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Erkebu turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Erkebu plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to buy a refrigerator.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Fabian

texts.es:
Fabián tiene 43 años, está casado y vive en su casa propia hecha con bloques de adobe junto a sus dos hijos. Hace más de 17 años se dedica formalmente a la agricultura en sus terrenos de 2 hectáreas con el firme apoyo de su pareja y de los trabajadores que suele contratar para las diversas tareas. Es conocido en su zona por dedicarse integralmente a la producción de cacao orgánico y café porque considera que son los productos rentables a pesar de necesitar constantemente capital para realizar la compra de insumos como abonos orgánicos y herramientas para realizar sus tareas cotidianas con las facilidades del caso.
Sus terrenos se ubican a una hora de su localidad y eso implica incrementar el coste por el transporte que suele pagar para llevar sus granos secos desde sus terrenos hasta la ciudad donde se ubican los centros de acopio. Le agrada mucho su labor puesto que es una actividad que desempeñó desde muy niño junto a sus hermanos.
Este es su tercer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante,además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de maneta puntual. En esta oportunidad desea contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para adquirir abono orgánico y herramientas para sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Fabian is 43 years old. He is married and lives in his own house made of mud blocks with his two children. For the past 17 years he has made a living farming his 2 hectare piece of land with the support of his partner and the workers he usually contracts to carry out different jobs. He is known in the area for working solely in the production of organic cocoa and coffee as he considers these products to be profitable despite constantly needing capital in order to buy supplies such as organic fertilizer and tools to carry out his everyday tasks easily.

His land is located an hour away from his area and this means he has to pay for transport to take the dried grain from his fields to the city where the collection centres are. He enjoys his job because he has done this since he was a boy together with his siblings.

This is his third loan cycle with Kiva and he feels grateful for the financial support he is receiving in order to continue getting ahead. Furthermore, he is committed to paying his monthly payments on time. On this occasion he hopes to receive 1,000 PEN to buy organic fertilizer and tools for his crops.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and farming tools.

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es: Don Alfonso, tiene 60 años de edad, está casado, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de La Lima, Cortes. Don Alfonso trabajo por muchos años con transporte de buses pero hace 3 años decidió con su esposa tener su propio negocio para cubrir los gastos del hogar y estableció una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica como ser carnes, refresco, churros, manteca, harina, productos de limpieza, huevos, pan, productos enlatados, lácteos, embutidos, plásticos, etc. El prestamo que solicito es por 15,000  Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de mas productos enlatados (salsinas, carnes, sardinas, vegetales mixtos, leches, etc.) y productos plásticos para la venta y asi poder tener variedad de productos para aumentar las ventas y sus ganancias. Su objetivo es  seguir creciendo con su negocio y sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Alfonso is 60 years old. He is married, has two children and lives in the municipality of La Lima, Cortes. Alfonso has worked for many years as a bus driver but 3 years ago he decided to open his own business with his wife in order to cover the costs of maintaining his household. He set up a grocery store where he sells basic staple foods such as meats, drinks, chips, butter, flour, cleaning products, eggs, bread, tinned products, dairy products, cold meats, plastic items, etc. 

This loan is for 15,000 HNL which he will invest in buying more tinned products (sauces, meats, sardines, mixed vegetables, milk, etc.) and plastic items to sell and be able to offer a greater range of products in order to increase sales and earnings. His objective is to continue extending his business and get his family ahead.

loans.use: to buy more tinned products (sauces, meats, sardines, mixed vegetables, milk, etc.) and plastic items to sell

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Mario, tiene la edad de 56 años, esta viudo y actualmente vive con su madre. El con el crédito pretende comprar los insumos como abonos para asistir su plantación de maíz. El cuenta con varios años ya de trabajar en esto tipo de siembras por lo cual necesita comprar estos productos y mejoras su plantación. El espera con esta mejora poder generar el máximo de producción y así aumentar las ganancias para su bienestar y el de su familia. El tienen pensado salir adelante con los pagos de su crédito también con lo generado con su cosecha de maíz y lo mas importante mejorar su economía. Es el segundo  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Mario, 56, is a widower and lives with his mother.  He plans to use the loan to buy supplies, such as fertilizer, for his corn crop.  He has been working in agriculture for several years and needs to buy these products and make improvements on his cropland.  

Mario hopes to increase production to earn more profit for his family's well being.  He will pay back the loan with the income from his corn crop and, what is most important, his economy will improve.

This is his second loan through FUDECOSUR.  Mario has never received any state bank loans and FUDECOSUR is giving him better payment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To plant corn.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel tiene 28 años, está casada con Juan Carlos y posee una vivienda hecha a base de adobe donde vive junto a sus dos hijas. Desde muy niña creció en el ambiente agrícola donde aprendió gracias a sus padres el oficio de la agricultura con el deseo de usarlo en el futuro como su principal sustento económico. A trabajado desde sus inicios con el apoyo de su pareja y trabajadores que contrata para mantener en óptimas condiciones la parcela de 2 hectáreas y media que posee con las plantaciones de cacao, café, barbasco, achiote; entre otros. Una de las tareas que considera complicada es el retiro de maleza porque posee terrenos muy fértiles que promueven el rápido crecimiento de la mala hierba. Suele fertilizar el suelo de sus parcelas con abono orgánico porque según comenta espera algún día heredar sus terrenos a sus hijas y por ello evita el uso de fertilizantes artificiales que deterioran los suelos agrícolas a largo plazo. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En está ocasión desea contar con  1,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Isabel is 28 years old, is married to Juan Carlos and lives in her adobe house with her two daughters. From being a very young girl she grew up in an agricultural setting where she learnt the skills of agriculture from her parents and hoped to use this in the future as her primary source of income. Right from the beginning she has had help from her partner and from labourers whom she hires to keep the land in top condition. She has two and a half hectares where she grows cocoa, coffee, barbasco, annatto and other crops. One of the jobs she finds difficult is clearing weeds because she has very fertile soil which promotes the rapid growth of weeds. She usually fertilises the soil with organic fertilizer because she says she wants to pass the land on to her daughters one day and this is why she avoids the use of synthetic fertilizers which damage the soil in the long term.

This is Isabel's second loan with Kiva and she is grateful for the financial support she is getting to make progress in life. She promises to pay her loan instalments punctually. On this occasion she wants to have 1,000 nuevos soles to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Pensamiento Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “PENSAMIENTO” iniciará el décimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Betty es la Tesorera. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen:, venta de comida, venta de cosméticos, venta de abarrotes, salón de belleza, venta de comida.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Betty es integrante, ella indica que hace seis años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido de chompas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años, al necesitar una fuente de ingreso decide emplear la técnica de tejido como medio de trabajo.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de lana) que adquirirá de las ferias mayoristas de la Ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener a su familia, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el compartir con las integrantes de su grupo.
texts.en:
The “PENSAMIENTO” communal bank will be starting its tenth cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Los Andes centre. It is made up of nine members and is run by a board of directors of which Betty is the Treasurer. The businesses which the members of the communal association run are varied and among them are: selling food, selling cosmetics, selling groceries and a beauty salon.

The loan they will take out will benefit small businesswomen of which Betty is an example. She says she joined Pro Mujer six years ago after being invited by a friend who is a member of the institution. Currently she runs a business knitting jumpers. She says learnt this business several years ago, when she needed an income and decided to use knitting as a means of earning money.

The loan she is taking out is to increase capital to buy wool which she will buy from the wholesale markets in the city of El Alto and will use to make goods to sell. This kind of work allows her to generate income to maintain her family, since she is married and has 2 children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she likes sharing with the other members of the group.

loans.use: to buy wool.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un hombre agricultor de 35  años de edad, está casado y vive en Sololá.  El tiene cuatro hijos. Ellos estudian en una escuela de su comunidad y apoyan a su padre en el campo, en tiempos libres.
El se dedica a la agricultura cultivando cebolla y cebollín en unos terrenos que renta en una finca, esta labor lo aprendió de su padre cuando era pequeño. Eligió esta actividad porque es rentable y  además tiene tiempo de realizar viajes en un carro que tiene. A través de la labor que realiza obtiene ingresos y ganancias  aceptables que le ayudan a contribuir con la economía de su familia.
El ahora cuenta con 10 años de experiencia en su propio cultivo, por lo que ha observado que en esta época del año existe una fuerte demanda en este tipo de actividad, de modo que está solicitando un préstamo de Q 6,000.00 para la compra de semillas de cebolla, abono químico y orgánico para luego cultivarlo y cosecharlo, con el propósito de mejorar  sus ingresos  y ganancias.
Su mayor sueño es seguir apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios y construir una vivienda para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is a 35 year old farmer who is married and lives in Sololá. He has four children. They study at a local school and help their father in his fields in their free time.

He makes a living in farming by growing onions and chives in some fields that he rents from an estate. He learnt this labour from his father when he was young. He chose the activity because it is profitable and also because he has time to make journeys in his car. Through this work he obtains an acceptable income and earnings which help him to contribute to the family economy.

He now has 10 years experience with his own crops and he has noticed that at this time of year there is a greater demand in this type of activity. This is why he is requesting a loan for 6,000 GTQ to buy onion seeds, chemical and organic fertilizer to later grow and harvest, with the aim of improving his income and earnings.

His biggest dream is to continue supporting his children in their studies and to build a house in order to improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy onion seeds, chemical and organic fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Criselda Milagro

texts.es:
Criselda, es una joven soltera, vive con su madre y sus hermanos, ella hace un tiempo asistió a una capacitación donde aprendió a elaborar velas, tiene la característica de ser emprendedora y no ha dudado en poner en práctica lo aprendido, es así como ella genera ingresos por su cuenta pues tiene en su casa de habitación un pequeño negocio donde ofrece sus productos.
Con la inversión comprara espelma, mechas, colorantes y vasos para que su inventario este completo y poder trabajar sin inconvenientes, espera cancelar sus deudas, aumentar sus ganancias, y aportar más dinero para los gastos de su casa.
Desea tener una variedad de producto, para ofrecer a sus clientes, ampliar su negocio y mejorar su economía.
texts.en:
Criselda is a single young woman who lives with her mother and siblings.  Some time ago she received training on how to make candles and, being very enterprising, there was no doubt in her mind that she should put what she learned into practice.  This is how she earns her own income and runs her small business from home where she offers her products.

She hopes that by investing in her business buying candle wax, wicks, colorings and glass jars her inventory will be complete so she can work without any inconveniences.  Her aim is to cancel her debts, increase her profits and contribute more money to the household economy.

Her desire is to have a wide variety of products to offer her customers in order to expand the business and improve her economy.

loans.use: To buy candle wax, wicks, coloring and glass jars.

loans.name: Almakul

texts.ru: Алмакул 59 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 8 детей. У Алмакул - высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Алмакул занимается животноводством, стартовав 13 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Алмакул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, а также имеет 4,9 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает картофель, фасоль, пшеницу и многолетние травы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Алмакул обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Алмакул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Almakul is 59 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising eight children. Almakul has a higher education. As the main source of income for her family, Almakul practices livestock breeding. She started this business 13 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Almakul's hard work, she currently has 2 milk cows on her farm as well as a 4.9 hectare plot of land on which she grows potatoes, beans, wheat and perennial grasses annually. Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Almakul turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Almakul plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to renovate her home.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Jenny Griselda

texts.es: Jenny, tiene 31 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos  y vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Hace 6 meses que decidió por generar sus propios ingresos para el sostenimiento de sus hijos, elabora y vende tortillas de maíz, esta actividad la realiza en su casa y también sale a vender a otras colonias de la zona. El prestamo que solicita es por 5,000 Lempiras y lo  va invertir en la compra de una máquina para hacer tortillas y harina de maíz. Esta inversión le ayudara a tener mayor producción de tortillas. Su plan es hacer crecer el negocio, ampliar el mercado y darle trabajo a mas personas en su negocio.
texts.en:
Jenny, 31, is a single mother. She has three children and lives in the municipality of Choloma, Cortés. Six month ago, she decided to generate her own income for the maintenance of her children. She is making and selling corn tortillas at home, although she also sells in the neighborhoods around the area.

She is requesting a loan of 5,000 lempiras [HNL] to buy a machine to make tortillas and corn flour. With this investment, she will be able to increase her tortillas production. Her plan is to expand her business, explore new markets and employ more people.

loans.use: to buy a machine to make tortillas and corn flour.

loans.name: Ronaldo

texts.es: Ronaldo es originario de la ciudad de Estelí, de 50 años de edad. Es un señor casado y padre de dos hijos. Él es abogado, se dedica a la gestión de cobros, negocio que lo emplea desde hace varios años el cual le ha generado ingreso para su hogar. Su meta próxima es seguir dándole mantenimiento al sistema de drenaje sanitario. Solicita el crédito de saneamiento para mejorar las condiciones sanitarias de su vivienda, con el fin de garantizar un entorno familiar más agradable. Estima que el crédito le será de ayuda ya que lograra tener un mejor entorno en su domicilio, limpio y seguro. Su plan futuro es mejorar cada vez mejor las condiciones de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ronaldo is from the city of Estelí. He is 50 years old, married and the father of two children. He is a lawyer and he makes a living working in debt collection. He has worked in this business for various years and it has provided income for his household.

His goal is to continue maintaining his drainage system. He is requesting a loan to improve the sanitary conditions of his house, with the hope of guaranteeing a more pleasant family environment. He hopes this loan with help him to obtain a better, cleaner and safer, living environment. His future plan is to continue improving his living conditions.

loans.use: to improve the sanitary conditions of his house.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria tiene de 33 años, está casada con Víctor  tienen 04 hijos que viven en su casa hecha con bloques de adobe. Desde muy joven se inició en la agricultura con el apoyo de su esposo en un terreno de 2 hectáreas con el cultivo de cacao, café, barbasco y otros. Gracias a las ganancias que obtuvo con varios años de trabajo cumplió uno de sus principales objetivos que fue poner una tienda de bebidas esperando obtener ingresos adicionales. Lleva más de 8 años con su pequeño negocio y se dedica a ello principalmente en horas de la tarde y los fines de semana puesto que al residir en una zona tropical y calurosa el consumo de bebidas heladas es muy popular. Posee una gran variedad de bebidas heladas como gaseosas y refrescos preparados a base de cebada y maíz morada siendo este último el preferido de su clientela.
Le agrada mucho tener su negocio abastecido y es por ello que acude hace un tiempo a su entidad financiera para adquirir su mercadería al por mayor. Este es su tercer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para comprar bebidas gaseosas al por mayor, así como sacos de cebada fresca y maíz morado para la preparación de sus bebidas.
texts.en:
Gloria, 33, is married to Víctor, they have four children and live in an adobe brick house.  She has worked in agriculture since she was very young and, with the support of her husband, works on a two-acre patch of land where she grows cocoa, coffee, mullein and other crops.  Thanks to the profits she has earned over several years she was able to meet one of her main goals which was to open a soft drink store in an aim to earn more income.

she has been running this small business for eight years, working there mainly in the afternoons and on weekends, since she lives in a warm, tropical climate where ice cold beverages are in high demand.  She has a wide variety of drinks, including sodas and soft drinks made with barley and purple maize, the latter being the most popular.

She likes to have her business well stocked so she has been coming to financial institution for a loans to buy wholesale merchandise.  This is her third Kiva loan and she is very grateful for the financial support.  She is committed to paying back the loan on time.

On this occasion she is requesting 1,000 PEN to buy wholesale sodas and sacks of fresh barley and purple maize to make her soft drinks.

loans.use: To buy wholesale soft drinks, fresh barley and purple maize.

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Fredy con su actividad comercial, pues con su credikiva logró comprar, calzado, juguetería, artículos navideños, al por mayor y de contado, aumentando sus ventas, las utilidades del negocio y mejorando así sus ingresos. Él se siente ahora mas respaldado con Kiva y la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, tiene muchas mas esperanzas, para un mejor futuro de él y de su familia. Por eso dice a sus financiadores: “ Muchos agradecimientos, a Kiva y a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, espero seguir contando con este apoyo tan importante.“  En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo financiamiento, mediante el cual comprará al por mayor y de contado, mercancía navideña, juguetería, ropa, calzado, aprovechando, que se acerca la temporada de fiestas, donde las familias (clientes)  gastan dinero en vestidos elegantes, calzado y con sus domicilios dotados de adornos ajustados a la época, para recibir alegres y bailando, las fiestas de fin de año y con cerrar el año en unidad familiar.
texts.en:
Thank you for supporting Fredy and his commercial activity; because with his CrediKiva loan he was able to buy Christmas items, shoes and toys wholesale and pay in cash.  This increased his sales and profits and improved his income.  With the support of Kiva and the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, he has higher hopes for a better future for his family and himself.  Therefore, he says to the lenders: "I am very grateful to Kiva and the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation and hope to continue receiving this important support."

He is currently requesting a new loan to pay in cash and buy wholesale Christmas merchandise, toys, clothing and shoes.  He wants to take advantage of the holiday season when families (customers) spend money on elegant clothes and shoes, and adorn their homes for the season.  They want to be happy and dance away the old year and celebrate the new year with family.

loans.use: To buy wholesale Christmas merchandise, toys, clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Jose Salvador

texts.es:
José, está casado, vive con su esposa y su hijo de un año, es un joven con ambiciones, sabe la responsabilidad que tiene con su familia, él es pilar principal de su hogar, debido a la necesidad de generar ingresos para cubrir los gastos de su casa, inicio una venta de artículos de primera necesidad, poco a poco ha ido ampliando su negocio, necesita invertir en la compra de granos básicos, jabón, azúcar y otros. Para poner  a la disponibilidad de sus clientes productos que consumen con mucha frecuencia.
Espera mejorar sus ingresos, tener un negocio más rentable, cancelar sus deudas, tener sus clientes muy satisfechos y atraer a nuevos clientes.
Sueña con ver a su hijo convertido en un profesional, tener un negocio con más productos, tener una economía más sostenible.
texts.en:
José is married and lives with his wife and one-year-old son.  He is an ambitious young man and knows how responsible he must be for his family as head of household.  Since he must earn an income for household expenses he started selling essential food items and little by little the business has grown.

He needs to buy basic grains, soap, sugar and other items that are in high demand among his customers.  He hopes to improve his income, have a more profitable business, pay off debt, keep his customers satisfied and attract new customers.  He wants his son to have a professional career.  

José wants to sell more products and have a more sustainable economy.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, soap and sugar.

loans.name: Sayra Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Sayra tiene 40 años de edad, originaria de la ciudad de Estelí, casada y madre de dos hijos. Es una humilde señora de oficio comerciante, dedicada a la venta de productos variados (perfumes, cremas y cosméticos) además a la costura, negocios que le han generado ingresos para su familia. Ella con tanto esfuerzo ha logrado salir adelante con sus hijos. Su meta próxima es culminar las mejoras de su vivienda. Solicita el crédito para mejorar las condiciones de saneamiento en su domicilio, con el fin de garantizar un hogar agradable y muy higiénico. Estima que con este crédito obtendrá  un cambio mejor en el ambiente de su vivienda, y mejores condiciones de vida para sus hijos. Su plan futuro es seguir manteniendo un mejor sistema de saneamiento seguro.
texts.en:
Sayra is 40 years old and comes from the city of Estelí. She is married with two children. She is a modest woman who works in retail, selling various products (perfumes, creams and cosmetics) as well as sewing. These businesses have provided her with an income for her family.

Sayra is asking for a loan to improve the sanitation facilities in her house, with the aim of making sure her home is pleasant and hygienic. She thinks that the loan will make a change for the better in her home environment and improve the living conditions for her children.

In the future she looks forward to having a safe and improved sanitation system.

loans.use: to improve the sanitation facilities in her home.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Para Carmen, mujer de 49 años de edad,  su vida transcurre en una máquina de coser desde hace 20 años, cuando su madre le enseñó el oficio de la costura y poco a poco ella, para sostenerse en el mercado y lograr una mejor calidad de las prendas de vestir, estudió técnicamente cada tarea de la confección y logró perfeccionar lo que su madre le había enseñado.
 Hoy diseña, corta, prepara, ensambla, termina prendas de vestir femeninas, masculinas e infantiles, con las que logra genera ingresos autónomos, vendiendo a crédito y de contado cada prenda de vestir, que usan las familias ubicadas alrededor de  su domicilio, donde habita y tiene su taller. Su meta es fortalecer cada vez mas su capital de trabajo y su planta física, pero su mayor desafió, es tener el dinero suficiente para lograrlo, lo cual la ha llevado a aplicar a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará al por mayor y de contado, telas, hilos, botones, correderas y moldes, con ello logrará incrementar su producción en una de las temporadas comerciales de picos altos, para su negocio, como el fin del año y esto es lo que justamente hacen de su credikiva una buena inversión, con un potencial de éxito..
texts.en:
Carmen is 49 years old. Her life has taken place behind a sewing machine for the last 20 years, since her mother taught her the art of dressmaking. Little by little Carmen, to keep herself in the market and to achieve high quality pieces of clothing, has studied each part of dressmaking technically and has been able to perfect what her mother had taught her.

Nowadays she designs, prepares, assembles and finished men's, women's and children's clothing. With this she obtains her own income, selling on credit and making cash sales with each item of clothing which the families from her neighbourhood, where she lives and works, use. Her goal is to continually strengthen her work capital and physical workspace, but her biggest challenge is having enough money to do so. This has led her to request a Kiva loan. This is her first loan cycle with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, through which she will buy fabric, thread, zips and patterns, both wholesale and retail. With this she will be able to increase her production during one of the biggest selling periods of the year for her business, as is the end of the year. This is exactly what will make her Kiva loan a good investment, with potential success.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, zips and patterns, both wholesale and retail.

loans.name: Sandra Cristina

texts.es:
La joven Sandra de 24 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos niñas, sus estudios los realizo hasta 9° grado, el motivo por el cual, no pudo seguir estudiando es por falta de recurso económico; desde entonces ella comenzó a trabajar en la venta de cosméticos, ropa y yuca con fresco junto a su madre, ella tiene cuatro hermanos uno de ellos ya falleció. Ella vive junto a su madre y sus otros hermanos.

La madre de ella se acompaño y hoy en día el señor esta enfermo y ella le ayuda a su madre económicamente para las medicinas. una de las hijas de Sandra, se graduara de kinder y la otra no esta estudiando; la pequeña párese de una enfermedad, que le produce un dolor muy fuerte en las articulaciones.

Sandra se dedica a la venta de ropa para hombre y mujer,  desde hace 4 años; esto lo aprendió por su madre. Ella decidió dedicarse a la venta, por que tiene que mantener a sus hijas, ya que el padre de ellas no le aporta mucho dinero y no posee otro tipo de actividad que pueda generar ingresos a la casa, el negocio de ella es ambulante no posee un puesto, ya que ella siente que vende mas vendiendo en casa por casa. Ella no tiene un horario de trabajo y no se involucra ninguna persona de su familia.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar pintura para la casa y alquilar unas mesas para la graduación de la hija, que celebrara en su casa y la otra parte lo invertirá en el negocio de ropa; ya que ella piensa comprar ropa de nuevos estilos para los clientes.  

La necesidad que sera satisfecha, es el poder celebrarle la graduación de kinder a su hija y poder comprar producto para la venta.   

El sueño que tiene ella, es lograr tener un lugar donde poder vivir tranquilamente, sin que nadie las moleste y que sus hijas puedan estudiar y llegar hacer unas profesionales, a demás que la chiquita se recupere de la enfermedad que tiene.
texts.en:
Young Sandra is 24 years old. She is a single mother of two girls. She studied up until 9th grade and then couldn't continue studying due to lack of economic resources. Since then she started working selling cosmetics, clothes and yuca with her mother, who has four children, one of which has passed away. She lives with her mother and other siblings.

Her mother found a partner who is now sick and she helps her mother financially so she can buy medicine. One of Sandra's children will graduate from kindergarten and the other one is not studying. The young girl suffers with a disease which causes her great pain in her joints.

Sandra has made a living for the past four years selling women's and men's clothing. She learnt this from her mother. She decided to make a living in this activity as she has to provide for her daughters, as their father does not contribute much money and she doesn't have any other type of business activity which can provide income to the household. Her business is itinerant. She doesn't have a stall as she feels she can sell more by going from house to house. She doesn't have a fixed timetable and no-one else in her family helps out.

The loan she is requesting is to buy paint for her house and rent some tables for her daughters graduation which they will celebrate in her house. The other part of the loan she will invest in her clothing business. She wants to buy new styles of clothing for her customers.
 
The need which will be covered is to celebrate her daughter's kindergarten graduation and to buy products to sell.

Her dream is to be able to have a quiet place to live where no-one will bother them and where her daughters can study and become professionals, as well as allowing the young girl to overcome her illness.

loans.use: to buy paint for her house and rent some tables for her daughters graduation which they will celebrate in her house. The other part of the loan she will invest in her clothing business.

loans.name: Natalya

texts.ru:
Наталья – предприниматель-сельскохозяйственник из Каменки. Она уже 5 лет занимается ведением тепличного хозяйства. Наталья выращивает овощи на участке родителей, а именно помидоры и огурцы. Ее семья молодая, сами зарабатывают, развиваются, воспитывают двоих детей. 
Наталье необходима сумма в 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы установить отопление в новой дополнительной теплице. В этом году в Украине прогнозируется очень холодная зима. Наталья не хочет потерять ранние посевы и намерена утеплить свои теплицы. Она любит заниматься выращиванием овощей, планирует и дальше развивать бизнес, приобрести еще земельный участок и построить на нем новые теплицы.
texts.en:
Natalia is an entrepreneur-farmer from Kamenka. For five years already, she has run a greenhouse facility. Nataliya grows vegetables on her parent's plot of land, namely tomatoes and cucumbers. She has a young family. They earn their own money, improve their lives and raise two children. 

Natalia needs 10,000 hryvnia to put in a heating system in her new, additional greenhouse. This year they are predicting a very cold winter in Ukraine. Natalia does not want to lose her first sowing of seeds and is intent on winterizing her greenhouse. She loves her business of growing vegetables and plans to further develop her business, buy another plot of land and build a new greenhouse on it.

loans.use: to install a heating system in her new greenhouse.

loans.name: Anara

texts.ru: Анаре 42 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Анары - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Анара занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 6,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Анары, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 8 лошадей, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 3,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Анара обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Анара планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку холодильника.
texts.en: Anara is 42 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising five children. Anara has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Anara practices livestock breeding. She started this business 20 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 6,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Anara's hard work, she currently has 8 horses and 10 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 3.000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Anara turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep to increase the size of her herd. Anara plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to buy a refrigerator.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Elizatkhan

texts.ru: Элизатхан 32 года, замужем, детей пока нет. У Элизатхан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Элизатхан занимается животноводством, стартовав 21 год назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Элизатхан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 2 овцы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 4,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Элизатхан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 12,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Элизатхан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку мебели.
texts.en: Elizatkhan is 32 years old, married, and does not yet have any children. Elizatkhan has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Elizatkhan practices livestock breeding. She started this business 21 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Elizatkhan's hard work, she currently has 1 milk cow and 2 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 4,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Elizatkhan turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 12,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep to increase the size of her herd. Elizatkhan plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to buy furniture.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Mairamkan

texts.ru: Майрамкан 36 лет, не замужем. У Майрамкан - высшее образование, работает преподавателем в университете, в качестве дополнительного дохода, Майрамкан занимается животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Майрамкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 2 овцы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 4,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Майрамкан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Майрамкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку зимней одежды для себя.
texts.en: Mairamkan is 36 years old and unmarried. Mairamkan has a higher education. She works as a teacher at a university. As a source of additional income, Mairamkan practices livestock breeding. She started this business 10 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Mairamkan's hard work, she currently has on 1 milk cow and 2 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 4,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Mairamkan turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Mairamkan plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to buy winter clothing for herself.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Guluypa

texts.ru: Гулуйпе 51 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Гулуйпы - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Гулуйпа занимается животноводством, стартовав 23 года назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гулуйпы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 2 лошади, 20 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 3,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гулуйпа обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Гулуйпа планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку холодильника.
texts.en: Guluypa is 51 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising four children. Guluypa has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Guluypa practices livestock breeding. She started this business 23 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Guluypa's hard work, she currently has on 2 milk cows, 2 horses and 20 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 3,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Guluypa turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Guluypa plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to buy a refrigerator.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Aitbu

texts.ru: Айтбу 53 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Айтбу - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Айтбу занимается животноводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Айтбу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 лошадь, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 3,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айтбу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Айтбу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку стиральной машины.
texts.en: Aitbu is 53 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising four children. Aitbu has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Aitbu practices livestock breeding. She started this business 14 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Aitbu's hard work, she currently has on 2 milk cows, 1 horse and 10 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 3,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Aitbu turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Aitbu plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to buy a washing machine.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Alymkan

texts.ru: Алымкан 49 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Алымкан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Алымкан занимается животноводством, стартовав 8 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Алымкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 5 дойных коров, 7 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Алымкан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Алымкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового дома для сына.
texts.en: Alymkan is 49 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising three children. Alymkan has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Alymkan practices livestock breeding. She started this business 8 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Alymkan's hard work, she currently has 5 milk cows and 7 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Alymkan turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Alymkan plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money to build a new house for her son.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Назире 41 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Назиры - средне-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Назира занимается животноводством, стартовав 17 лет назад, с покупки скота на 20,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Назиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова,2 овцы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Назира обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 55,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Назира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Nazira is 41 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising two children. Nazira has a secondary specialized education. As the main source of income for her family, Nazira practices livestock breeding. She started this business 17 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Nazira's hard work, she currently has 1 milk cow and 2 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Nazira turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 55,000 som (KGS) to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Nazira plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money for the future education of her children.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Scovia

texts.en:
Scovia is 47 years old and lives in the town of Masaka, which is in Uganda. She is married and has seven children of whom three are currently in school. For the past 17 years, Scovia has been working hard to manage her school, which provides teaching services. 

To help expand her school, Scovia has requested a loan of 2,500,000 UGX from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to expand the school building, and it will help Scovia to generate greater profits and provide enough basic needs for her children. Scovia hopes that in the future she will be able to expand her school business nationally. 

Scovia is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP). The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Scovia who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans but who have businesses that have grown too large for micro-loans.

loans.use: to expand the school building.

loans.name: Bukurije

texts.en:
Bukurie, who was photographed in front of her house, wants to buy a dairy cow. From the photo, you might guess that her living conditions are not that good. Livestock has been her activity for the past five years. 

Here is how Bukurie expressed herself during the interview:

“I have been able to make a little income from selling raw milk to the locals. When the milk production is a bit more, I make cheese and butter, and I sell them. In addition, I secure my family’s dairy needs almost all the time. Livestock is a good practice for us who live in the village, and the majority of us enjoy doing it, too.” 

Bukurie is a 41-year-old mother of three children who lives in the northern part of Albania.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Edda

texts.en:
Edda is a married woman who rents a house that has no piped water but has electricity. Her greatest monthly expense is food.
 
She has operated a tailoring business for the past four years. She makes women's and men's suits. Her potential clients are ladies and gentlemen. She dreams of establishing a boutique in the future. 

With the KES 50,000, she wants to purchase cloth fabrics and sewing thread for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth fabrics and sewing thread for her business.

loans.name: Durdonokhon

texts.ru: Дурдонохон 19 лет, не замужем, проживает с родителями. У Дурдонохон - среднее образование, занимается сельским хозяйством, родители активно помогают в бизнесе. Очень трудолюбивая, ответственная и целеустремленная девушка. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Дурдонохон занимается животноводством, стартовав 1 год назад, с покупки скота на 30,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Дурдонохон, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 5 овец, а также имеет земельный надел размером 0,32 ГА, на котором выращивает картофель, кукурузу, хлопок. Ежемесячный доход составляет 3,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Дурдонохон обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Дурдонохон планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Durdonokhon is 19 years old, unmarried, and lives with her parents. Durdonokhon has a secondary education. She does farming and her parents actively help her in this business. She is a very hardworking, responsible, motivated young woman. As the main source of income for her family, Durdonokhon practices livestock breeding. She started this business one year ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 30,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Durdonokhon's hard work, she currently has 5 sheep on her farm as well as a 0.32 hectare plot of land on which she grows potatoes, corn and cotton. Her monthly income is 3,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Durdonokhon turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy sheep to fatten up and then resell at the market for a high price. Durdonokhon plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es:
María, tiene 50 años, vive con sus hijos, se ha visto en la necesidad de emprender su negocio, de antojitos en el cual ofrece  papas fritas, pasteles, yuca, etc. Para adquirir la materia prima necesaria está solicitando capital para comprar: maíz, frijol, yuca, papas, aderezos, aceite y queso.
Espera tener mejores ingresos, producir más variedad de antojitos, cancelar puntualmente sus cuotas, y atraer a más clientes.
Suela con tener un negocio más estable que le de las ganancias necesarias para seguir a poyando a sus hijos, darles mejor educación y salud de calidad.
texts.en:
María is 50 years old and lives with her children. She saw the need to start her own business selling snacks such as potato chips, pies and cassava. She is requesting a loan to buy the ingredients she needs: corn, beans, cassava, potatoes, spices, oil and cheese.

With this investment, she hopes to increase her income, offer a wider variety of snacks, pay her installments on time and attract more customers.

She dreams of a more stable business with which she can earn enough to continue supporting her children, and give them a good education and a high-quality healthcare.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, cassava, potatoes, spices, oil and cheese.

loans.name: Kairinisa

texts.ru: Кайринисе 48 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Кайринисы - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Кайриниса занимается животноводством, стартовав 28 лет назад, с покупки скота на 4,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Кайринисы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 овца. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Кайриниса обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Кайриниса планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Kairinisa is 48 years old, married, and together with her husband, is raising four children. Kairinisa has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Kairinisa practices livestock breeding. She started this business 28 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 4,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Kairinisa's hard work, she currently has 2 milk cows and 1 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Kairinisa turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) to buy young bulls to fatten up and then resell at the market for a high price. Kairinisa plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock.

loans.use: to buy calves for fattening up and resale.

loans.name: Arzikan

texts.ru: Арзикан 53 года, разведена, одна воспитывает 6 детей. У Арзикан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Арзикан занимается животноводством, стартовав 23 года назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Арзикан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Арзикан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Арзикан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Arzikan is 53 years old, divorced, and is raising six children on her own. Arzikan has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Arzikan practices livestock breeding. She started this business 23 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Arzikan's hard work, she currently has 4 milk cows and 10 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Arzikan turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy young bulls to fatten up and then resell at the market for a high price. Arzikan plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock.

loans.use: to buy calves for fattening up and reselling.

loans.name: Dulce Maria

texts.es: Dulce es una señora de 45 años de edad, originaria de la ciudad de Rivas. Casada y madre de cinco hijos, los cuales dos aún están a su cargo. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva. Inicio este negocio hace quince años incentivada por su hermana quien también vendía ropa, desde entonces decidió tener su negocio. Hoy en día cuenta con el negocio de venta de ropa, el cual le ha generado ingresos para su familia. Su meta próxima es realizar unas mejoras de infraestructura en su vivienda y seguir con el negocio. Solicita el crédito para comprar mercadería como: camisas, pantalones, artículos varios entre otros, con el fin de ofrecer una diversidad de productos a sus clientes. Estima que el crédito le ayudara a incrementar la mercadería en su negocio y obtener más ganancias. Su plan futuro es ahorrar para asegurar su futuro.
texts.en:
Dulce is 45 years old and married with five children, two of whom are still under her care. She is a native of the city of Rivas. Dulce is a businesswoman who sells new clothing. She started her business fifteen years ago, encouraged by her sister, who was also selling clothing at that time.  Today, Dulce’s business generates income for her family. She says that her next goal is to make some major improvements to her house and to continue with her business. 

Dulce is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as shirts, pants and other articles of clothing. She says that she wants to offer her customers a diverse selection of items, and she foresees that the loan will help her to improve her profit. Dulce says that her plan for the future is to save enough to be financially secure.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as shirts, pants and other articles of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Muna Abdilahi

texts.en: Muna Abdilahi is 22 years old.  She studies at Alpha University College, faculty of Information Technology.  She needs a laptop to write her graduation thesis book, prepare assignments and read lessons when given in soft copy.  She cannot pay the money all at one time.  She approached Kaaba MFI and then Kaaba will provide her with a laptop that she can pay for in installments.  Muna hopes to improve her learning when she gets the laptop.

loans.use: To buy a laptop for education purposes.

loans.name: Walid

texts.en:
Walid is a 38-year-old single man who has been working in selling books for the past nineteen years. He is the sole breadwinner for four members of his family and that's why he has to keep his business up to date and be ready to respond to any customers' needs.

Walid is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to increase his book inventory with newly released editions requested by his customers.  Walid is well known in his region with good quality products served and special prices.  Walid will keep on working hard to expand his business and open a larger bookstore and stationery department in a better region.

loans.use: To increase his book inventory with newly released editions requested by his customers

loans.name: Ilgar

texts.en:
İlgar is 39 years old. He is an experienced builder, so he repairs home, paints walls, makes ceilings, and so on. He has been in this business for 9 years. 

He is a single man who lives with his mother. His mother is sick and she takes medication regularly. Ilgar’s family lives in Pirallahi village in Baki region.

He has applied for a loan in the amount of 1400 AZN to buy new materials (colors for walls, rollers for painting, plaster and other items) which are useful in his business.

He thankful to Komak and Kiva for their help. In the future, he wants to get married and have great family, and for his business he needs to hire an assistant.

loans.use: to buy new materials for his business.

loans.name: Topi Group

texts.en:
Tatu, who is in her early thirties, is single with two kids who are in school. Since 2008, she has been engaged in a genge (grocery store) business selling charcoal, fruits and vegetables. She is doing fine with her business and is able to make a fair monthly profit. Tatu normally works from 7 am to 9 pm every day. 

This will be her fifth loan from Kiva partner Tujijenge Tanzania, and she will use it to restock more fruits and vegetables. With her previous loans, which ware all all paid back in full, Tatu purchased more business stock which made her genge attract more customers. She also purchased secondhand clothes, which she resells, and sacks of charcoal, which she divides up and sells in small packages. With her business profit, she covered home expenses, food expenses and school fees. Tatu dreams of buying a plot of land. 

She will share this loan with her loan group Topi, which consists of 10 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock more fruits and vegetable for her business.

loans.name: Davit

texts.en:
Davit lives and works at the Kapan city which is in the Syunik region.  He lives with his wife.  His two sons are married and they live with their families and his daughter lives and works in Yerevan city as an accountant.  Davit has been running his own business for twenty years; he has an auto repair shop.  He has a lot of customers who trust him very much, since he works properly and very conscientiously. 

Davit asks for a loan of 1,100,000 Armenian drams in order to complete the repair of his space and to also buy the necessary tools.  This is Davit’s second loan with Kiva.

loans.use: to complete the repair of his space and to also buy the necessary tools

loans.name: 01.10.02 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Minh has a retail business selling clothes.  She is requesting a loan to purchase clothes and souvenirs to resell.

Minh is 55 years old and she is married with 2 children.  Minh is the group leader of the 01.10.02 Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of 3 members.  Minh supports no dependents with her business in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province since her children are grown up.

In 2012, Minh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business.  Minh has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  Minh has been involved in this business for 3 years.  The main hardship that Minh faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Minh hopes for her family to be healthy and happy and for her business to do well, and to travel for vacation within the country.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and souvenirs to resell

loans.name: 02.01.15 Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thúy works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle. She has been involved in her business for 3 years.She is requesting a loan to purchase chickens and pigs to raise and resell in the future.
She is 24 years old and she is married with 1 child.

Thúy is the group leader of the 02.01.05 Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of 5 members. She lives with 1 dependent. in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2011, Thúy joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Thúy has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main hardship that Thúy faces in her business is a lack of capital.

With her business profits, Thúy hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and pigs to raise and resell in the future.

loans.name: Kadzo

texts.en:
Kadzo has operated a food vending business, selling at the market to market dwellers and passersby.  She cites seasonality to be her major challenge.  She dreams of expanding and establishing a restaurant in the future.

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase cooking fat, rice, beans, and wheat flour for the business.  She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business and she appreciates the support of a fast loan

loans.use: to purchase cooking fat, rice, beans, and wheat flour for the business.

loans.name: David Antonio

texts.es:
David, tiene 31 años, está acompañado, vive con su compañera de vida y su hija de 18 años, se dedica a la acuicultura, aprendió el  oficio de su padre cuando era un pequeño, hace 10 años lo trabaja propio, de lunes a sábado en un horario de 6:00 a.m. a 12:00 p.m.
Necesita capital para comprar fertilizantes, plaguicidas, abono y semillas, para preparar la tierra y sembrar maíz y frijol. Con esto tendrá una cosecha muy abundante, mejores ingresos, y podrá cancelar las cuotas.
Sueña con tener un negocio muy rentable que le de los ingresos que necesitas para cubrir los gastos de su familia.
texts.en:
David is 31 and lives with his partner and their 18-year-old daughter. He works in agriculture, which he learnt from his father as a young boy. He has been working in this business independently for 10 years, working from Monday to Saturday from 6am to 12pm. He needs capital to buy fertilizer, pesticide, manure and seeds, in order to prepare the land and sow maize and beans. With all this, he will have a good harvest and improve his income, and will be able to meet his repayments.
His dream is to have a profitable business that will afford him the income he needs to cover his household's costs.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser, pesticide, manure and seeds.

loans.name: Nkanga Tukoregye3 Group

texts.en:
Joseph is 46 years old and a member of Nkanga Tukoregye3 Group. He is a father of four children and he takes care of all of them. He is described as a courageous person because he has always found a way to provide for his family, despite his busy schedule working as a pharmacist. He has so many people coming to his pharmacy.

Joseph will use this loan to buy supplies such as medicine and gloves, among other things, for the pharmacy. He says that his dream is to improve the living conditions of his family and to be able to pay for a private practice so that he can provide better health services for the people in his community. He is hard working and thanks Kiva lenders for being supportive of his group.

loans.use: to buy pharmaceuticals

loans.name: Makvala

texts.en:
Makvala lives in the village of Khabume. She is 56 years old, widowed and lives with her son, daughter-in-law, two grandchildren and retired mother. 

The source of income for the family is an agricultural business. They breed two milk cows, two calves and a pig. Besides, Makvala grows maize and sells the harvest at the local open market.
 
Makvala and her son, Badri, decided to start a new business as their existing income wasn't enough for the family. Her loan request was approved in the frame of a new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages the provisions of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to the country's rural poor, who do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low incomes. 

With the loan, Makvala will purchase a car and Badri will serve the local people as a taxi driver. The income of the family will increase, and they will be able to improve their living conditions in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a car for her son to use it as a taxi.

loans.name: 02.04.04 Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Liên is 29 years old, married, and has two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province. Liên is the group leader of the 02.04.04 Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of five members. 

Liên has a service shipping goods. Liên has been involved in this business for five years. In 2010, Liên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Liên has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase equipment to do a sand-shipping service.The main hardship that Liên faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Liên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for a sand-shipping  service.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is from the Gori District. He is an internally displaced person and now lives in the refugee settlement of the village of Berbuki with his large family: his wife, two toddler children, parents, sister and two nieces. 

George runs a small-scale agricultural business and owns an apple garden. He sells his harvest seasonally. The only monthly income for the family is a small refugee assistance from the local government, which is hardly enough to cover feeding costs for the family of nine.

In order to generate income, George plans to start a trading business with fruits and vegetables. With the loan amount, he will purchase fresh products in bulk and sell them in his district with a price mark-up. George owns a mini-bus and will use it in making deliveries.
