He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy building materials for repairing his house

loans.name: Bollo Moy Dolle Group

texts.fr: Le Groupement BOLLO MOY DOLE a comme présidente Ndèye Anta. Il est composé de 5 membres qui font toutes parties d’un autre grand groupement pour faire de la tontine. Elles habitent dans le même quartier et font du commerce. Madame Ndèye Anta est marié et mère de famille. A part ces propres besoin elle n’a pas de charges particulières. Elle évolue dans le commerce de poisson et a une expérience de 4ans dans  cette activité. Madame Ndèye sollicite ce prêt pour renforcer son fond de commerce afin de pouvoir satisfaire sa demande. Elle commence sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 18h. A l’avenir elle souhaite pouvoir réaliser le maximum de bénéfice pour réaliser son rêve qui est de construire sa maison et mettre ses enfants dans de bonnes conditions.
texts.en: The group BOLLO MOY DOLE has Ndèye Anta as its president. It comprises five members who are all part of a larger group to form a tontine. The women live in the same district and work in commerce. Ms. Ndèye Anta is married and a mother with a family. Aside from her own needs, she has no other particular expenses. She has been working at fish selling and has four years of experience in this business. Ms Ndèye is requesting this loan to bolster her capital, so as to be able to satisfy the demand. Her day starts at 9 AM and end at 6 PM.  For the future, she would like to be able to maximize her profits to realize her dream of building a house and providing good living conditions for her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en:
Beatriz has a live-in partner and seven children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Beatriz is 48 years old and two of her children are still in school.

Beatriz has a vegetable and fruit selling business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for six years. Beatriz has requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more vegetables and fruits to sell in her stall. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables and fruits to sell in her stall

loans.name: Sope Serigne Bara Group

texts.fr: Le Groupement Sope Serigne Bara est composé de 5 personnes habitant tous dans le même quartier et se réunissent chaque jour pour leur besoin en tontine. Leur présidente s’appelle BOLO qui a levé la main sur la photo. Elle fait du commerce de céréales et a une expérience de plus de 10 ans dans cette activité. Elle sollicite ce montant pour acheter du mil, arachide niébé pour ensuite les revendre. BOLO commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 16h. Elle n’a pas de charges particulières à part ces besoins. A l’avenir elle souhaite bénéficier plus de crédit pour augmenter d’avantage son stock de marchandises.
texts.en:
The group Sope Serigne Bara consists of five members who live in the same neighborhood and meet daily for the purposes of their savings group. 

The group’s president is BOLO, seen in the photo with her hand raised. She sells cereals and has over ten years of experience in this activity. She is seeking this loan to buy millet, groundnuts and niebe for resale. 

BOLO starts her day at 8 AM and works until 4 PM. She doesn’t have any particular expenses aside from her own personal needs. 

In the long term, she hopes to obtain additional credit to further increase her stock of merchandise to sell.

loans.use: to buy millet, groundnuts and niebe for resale.

loans.name: Amoko

texts.fr: Amoko est une jeune dame de 31ans ayant en charge 02 enfants(12 et 08) tous scolarisés. Elle a démarré son activité de revendeuse d’ignames, de bouillie à domicile et au marché depuis 2000. Pour l'achat des ignames et du mais entrant dans la préparation de la bouillie, elle fait un premier crédit à WAGES. Le gain tiré de cette vente lui permettra de stocker plus de marchandises et de bien nourrir sa famille.
texts.en:
Amoko, age 31, is a young woman with two dependent children aged 8 and 12 who both attend school. 

In 2000, she started an activity selling yam and porridge from her home and at the market. She is seeking a first loan from WAGES to buy some yams and the maize she needs to prepare the porridge. 

The profits earned through this activity will allow her to stock up on supplies and better feed her family.

loans.use: to buy yams and maize.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
Emilio, está acompañado, vive con su compañera de vida y dos hijos, se dedica a la ganadería, siembra de granos básicos y albañilería, desde que era un joven aprendió a sembrar granos básicos, a manejar la crianza de ganado,  lo aprendió de su padre, además para generar ingresos se dedica a la albañilería, con la inversión comprar, fertilizantes, plaguicidas, abono y una vaca para que su negocio cuente con lo necesario para generar más ganancias y poder pagar las deudas.
Aspira a mejorar su producción, aumentar el ganado y darle a sus hijos una mejor alimentación, educación y salud.
texts.en:
Emilio lives with his common-law wife and two children. He raises cattle, plants basic grains and works as a bricklayer. When he was young he learned from his father how to grow basic grains and manage the raising of cattle. To earn more money he works as a bricklayer.

Emilio will use the loan to buy fertilizer, insecticide, manure and a cow. Then his business will have what it needs to generate more revenue and he can pay his debts. He hopes to increase his production, have more cattle and give his children better food, education and health.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticides, manure and a cow.

loans.name: Suriya

texts.en:
Suriya is a 45-year-old woman raising eight children. She lives with her family in Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has owned a small hair oil shop for the past five years. He sells a variety of hair oils, including olive, coconut, jojoba oil, etc. in his shop.

Presently, Suriya's husband needs capital to purchase coconut hair oil and almond hair oil. For this purpose, Suriya has requested a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband’s shop and she is hopeful that the loan will bring a positive and progressive change in their income.

loans.use: to purchase coconut and almond hair oil.

loans.name: Caritas

texts.en:
Caritas is 58 years old. She is married, with four children. 

She has sold used clothes for the past five years. With the loan, she would like to buy more trousers for gents and ladies for sale. 

The profits from the business will be used to provide food for her family.

loans.use: To buy more clothes, especially trousers for ladies and gents

loans.name: Estrelita

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Estrelita works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from raising pigs.  Estrelita is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish business.

Estrelita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more flour, sugar, margarine, and other ingredients to step up her overall sales.

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma works hard to support her family. Elma is single, and she has a fruit-vending business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 9,500 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fruits to sell.

Elma has been in this business for nine years now.

In the future, Elma would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fruits to sell

loans.name: Henriette

texts.en:
Henriette is 21 years old. She is single, and she has been in business for the past two years. 

She sells charcoal, and with the loan she wants to buy more charcoal for sale. 

The profits from the business will be used to pay her tuition fees.

loans.use: To buy more charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Zahra Group

texts.en:
This group is called Zahra. It consists of four ladies who live in Aden, Yemen. 

Arwa is the leader of this group. She is 38 years old and married, with five children.  She has started up a business of selling perfumes and clothes. 

She is an uneducated woman from a poor family. She decided two years ago to help her family and earn some money to provide better living conditions for her children. 

She has applied for a loan of YER 60,000 from AMB to buy clothes to keep her business running and expand it. She said she has a small amount of money that she collected herself, but it is not enough to buy goods to expand her business.  

She looks forward to making large profits and starting to accumulate money to have her own clothing store.

loans.use: to buy clothes to keep her business running and expand it.

loans.name: Taji

texts.ru: Тачи 59 лет она из района Дж.Руми. У Тачи большая семья, состоящая из сыновей, невестки и внучки. Все они мирно живут в одном доме. Тачи в течение нескольких лет работает в кинотеатре. Она хочет взять кредит, чтобы купить своей невестке швейную машинку. Ее невестка очень хорошо умеет шить и кроить национальные женские платья, но не имеет швейной машинки. Тачи не хочет, чтобы ее невестка не использовала свой талант и к тому же такая деятельность прибыльная. Тачи хочет помочь невестке. По этой причине она берет кредит. Помогите Тачи!
texts.en: Taji is 59 years old and she is from the J.Rumy district.  Taji has a big family, consisting of sons, a daughter-in-law and granddaughters.  All of them live peacefully in one house.  Taji has been working at a movie theater for several years.  She wants to obtain this loan to purchase a sewing machine for her daughter-in-law.  Her daughter-in-law can sew very well and make women's national dresses, but does not have a sewing machine.  Taji wants her daughter-in-law to use her talent, and, besides, this business is profitable.  Taji wants to help her daughter-in-law.  This is why she is requesting this loan.  Help Taji!

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine for her daughter-in-law

loans.name: Door Waar 1 Group

texts.fr:
Le  groupe de crédit Door Warr   n°1 regroupe 5 femmes habitant la même localité .Elles s’activent dans la vente de  légumes, restauration charbon, huile de palme etc……...
La présidente, YACINE  avec une expérience de 5ans  achète la marchandise dans  la localité pour aller  la revendre dans la capitale. Elle appui son mari dans la dépense quotidienne  de la famille. Elle commence sa journée à 9h pour la terminer vers les environs de 18h. YACINE a comme  vœux dans  l’avenir, d’ouvrir un magasin pour concentrer son activité vers sa zone et être autonome.
texts.en:
The loan group Door Waar n°1 consists of five women who all live in the same district. Their commercial activities include the sale of vegetables, charcoal, palm oil, restaurant services, etc.

YACINE, the group’s president, has five years of experience in her commercial activity. She buys her stock locally to sell in the capital. She starts her day at 9 AM and works until about 6 PM. She helps her husband with the family’s daily expenses. 

In the long term, YACINE would like to open a store to centralize her activity in her area, and she hopes to become self-sufficient.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Imad

texts.en:
Imad is a 39-year-old married father of two children. He has been working in selling car hardware for eighteen years.
He is his family's sole breadwinner, his wife doesn't work, so he has to work hard to make sure that he can easily respond to his family's increasing needs.
Imad is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to increase his business merchandise with special requested car hardware. He will use part of this loan to pay for his wife's hospital needs since they are expecting a new baby soon.

He hopes to keep on expanding his business to make sure that he will be capable of covering his children's future university fees.

loans.use: to increase his business merchandise with special requested car hardware.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Estrella works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling fish in the Philippines and also earns additional income from raising pigs.  Estrella is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase more different fish to sell for her buying and selling fish business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now requests a new loan to further build her business.

Estrella has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more different fish to sell.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
As the married parent of eight children, Gina works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling mud crabs in the Philippines, and she also earns income from raising livestock. 

Gina is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional kilos of mud crabs to sell for her mud crabs business.

Gina has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of  saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional kilos of mud crabs to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to bolster his working capital and stock up on palm nuts to process into oil to sell in order to increase his revenue.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plantains, eddoes and potatoes for her business.

loans.name: Jean De Dieu

texts.en: Jean De Dieu, a 26-year-old father of three, has been selling utensils for the past eight years. He has requested this loan to buy more cooking oil and saucepans for resale. Jean De Dieu is planning to renovate his house and provide more food for the family from the new profits arising from the loan.

loans.use: To buy more cooking oil and saucepans for resale.

loans.name: Sophie

texts.fr: Sophie est une femme de 52 ans veuve et mère de 06 enfants dont l'âge vari entre 30 et 15 ans. Elle est commerçante et fait la vente en détail des vivres frais(légumes, maniocs, plantains, etc) en fonction des saisons dans un marché de la place depuis 03 ans. Elle a une bonne connaissance des fournisseurs, et surtout de sa clientèle qu'elle a acquise au fil du temps grâce à son expérience dans ce domaine. Mais elle se retrouve constamment en rupture de stock parce qu'elle est obligée de faire écouler tous le stock pour pouvoir s'en procurer à nouveau ceci à cause de la petitesse de son capital. Elle souhaiterai augmenter son stock de vivres en achetant en gros ceci augmentera non seulement ses ventes mais aussi son bénéfice. Bénéfice qu'elle réinvestira en partie dans son activité pour l'agrandir et le reste lui permettra de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Sophie is a 52-year-old widow and mother of six children, ranging in age from 15 to 30 years.  She is a trader, and has made retail sales of fresh produce (vegetables, cassava, plantains, etc), according to the season, at a local market for three years.  She knows her suppliers well, and also her customers, who she has built up over the years.

Sophie often runs out of stock because her lack of capital means that she has to sell all her products before she has enough money to buy further supplies.  She would like to increase her stocks of food by buying in bulk.  This will, not only increase her sales, but also her earnings.  These earnings will be used to reinvest in her business and also pay for the expenses of her family.

loans.use: to buy       and fresh produce for resale.

loans.name: Musarat

texts.en:
Musarat, a 52-year-old hardworking woman, lives with her husband and four children. Since 2000, her husband has been running his own window glass shop and is interested in continuing to grow the business. 

Musarat has requested a loan from Kiva Field Partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband to purchase more glass and a glass-cutting machine. This will enable him to provide a greater variety of services to his clients and increase his net income and savings. 

Musarat wants to live a good and simple life with her family. She wishes to renovate her house, provide a quality education to all of her children, and fulfill all of the other basic needs of her family. She prays a lot for her children's better future and her husband's good health. She is very thankful to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase more glass and a glass-cutting machine

loans.name: Naga Tegal Wangi Group

texts.en:
In order to further enhance earnings in the field of breeding pigs, Ni Made and the group, Naga Tegal Wangi, continue borrowing the same amount  from MUK. They are very satisfied with the services provided, so they agreed to develop this business. Ni Made will use the loan to buy two super-quality piglets for later sale as their price remains high. She still expects the assistance of MUK with business consulting. Her profits will be saved for future needs.
(Ni Made is pictured in the front row, holding a book.)

loans.use: to buy 2 super-quality piglets for later sale

loans.name: Mardonio

texts.es:
Mardonio tiene 58 años, es viudo y es el principal sostén de sus 4 hijos que viven con el en su vivienda hecha a base de material noble. Inicialmente se dedicaba a las actividades agrícolas concernientes a la producción de cacao orgánico en su localidad a lado de su esposa e hijos, pero tras quedarse viudo se vio en la necesidad de optar por otro oficio que aprendió desde joven que es la pintura y planchado y pintura de vehículos. Es un oficio que empezó hace más de 15 años y que le ha servido mucho para mantener su hogar económicamente. Día a día diversos dueños de vehículos con desperfectos visitan su establecimiento ubicado en la parte trasera de su domicilio y brinda sus servicios realizando sus trabajos con los conocimientos en pintura especial y uso de calor. Debe de contar con mucha paciencia y precisión siendo factores primordiales para lograr brindar un servicio de calidad. Este es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
Desea en esta ocasión contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para la compra de un balón de gas industrial y pintura para vehículos esperando cumplir algunos trabajos pendientes.
texts.en:
Mardonio is a 58-year-old widower, and is the main breadwinner for his four children, who live with him in his solidly-constructed house. Initially, he worked in agriculture, in the production of organic cocoa in his neighbourhood, with his wife and children. However, after he was widowed, he saw the need to opt for the job that he had learned as a youngster: panel-beating and painting, and doing vehicle paintwork. He started this business more than 15 years ago, and it has served him well in making a living. Each day, various owners of damaged vehicles come to his business, which is located at the back of his home. He offers his services, which include a good knowledge of specialised paintwork that requires the use of heat. He works patiently with great precision to provide a quality service.

This is Mardonio's second Kiva loan, and he is thankful for the financial support to carry on his work. He is also committed to making his repayments punctually. This time, he is requesting 1,000 nuevos soles to buy a balloon of industrial gas as well as car paint so that he can take care of several jobs that are pending.

loans.use: to buy a balloon of industrial gas and car paint.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased quantities of cooking pots and bowls

loans.name: Gie Assy Group

texts.fr: Le GIE ASSY est un groupement composé de 5 personnes habitant tous le même quartier et se réunissent à chaque fois de besoin.  Madame Henriette qui  est leur présidente est reconnu par la main levée sur la photo. Elle est mariée et mère de famille qui évolue dans le commerce de poissons frais et a une expérience de plus de 2ans dans cette activité.  Elle a en charge sa petite famille qui est composé de son enfant et sa petite sœur. Elle a besoin de ce montant pour acheter des poissons et les revendre à ses clients. Henriette commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 16h de l’après midi. A l’avenir elle souhaite bénéficier plus de crédit dans l’institution pour agrandir son activité et augmenter ses revenus. Ainsi elle pourra améliorer les conditions de vie de sa petite famille.
texts.en:
Gie Assy is a group of five women who all live in the same neighbourhood, and work together whenever the need arises.  Henriette is their president and can be seen in the photo with her hand raised.  

Henriette is a married mother who has more than two years experience in selling fresh fish.  She is responsible for her family which consists of her child and her younger sister.

Henriette will use her loan to buy fish and resell them to her customers.  She starts her working day at 8am and finishes at 4pm.  

In the future, she would like to use further loans from this field partner, to grow her business and increase her earnings.  In this way, she could improve the living conditions of her immediate family.

loans.use: to buy fresh fish for resale.

loans.name: Kokou

texts.fr: Mr Kokou, revendeur de produits d'alimentation générale sollicite un second crédit à WAGES pour acheter plus de marchandises afin de répondre aux besoins des clients. Marié, il a 02 enfants scolarisés. Il espère développer son activité commencé en 2010 et assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en:
Mr Kokou sells food products.  He has requested a second loan from the field partner, WAGES, in order to buy more stock so that he can meet the needs of his customers better.  

Kokou is married and has two children who both attend school.  

He started his business in 2010 and wants to develop it further, in order to secure the day-to-day needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Mukhavat

texts.ru: Мухават 41 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 1 сына. У Мухават - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Мухават занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 15 лет назад, с покупки скота на 4,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Мухават, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 лошадь, а также имеет земельный надел размером 0,30 ГА, на котором выращивает фасоль, картофель и многолетнюю траву. Ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). Мухават входит в группу "Киреше", в эту группу входят еще 2 человека. Мухават является вторым членом группы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Мухават обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетели для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Мухават планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Mukhavat is 41 years old, married and raising a son together with her husband. Mukhavat has a secondary education. To provide the primary income for her family, Mukhavat is involved in animal husbandry and farming, having started 15 years ago with a purchase of livestock with 4,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Mukhavat's hard work, today her business contains 2 dairy cows, 1 horse and also a 0.30 hectare land plot, where she grows beans, potatoes and perennial herbs. The monthly income amounts to 5,000 som (KGS).  Mukhavat is part of the "Kireshe" group that consists of two more people.  She is the leader of this group.  In order to further develop her business, Mukhavat requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy a heifer to increase livestock headcount. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy a heifer to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Barohat

texts.ru: Барохат позитивная и ответственная женщина. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Она живёт со своей семьёй в небольшом посёлке. Но дом, в котором они живут, маловат и не совсем  благоустроен для хорошего проживания в нём. Она очень трудолюбивая и заботливая мама. Барохат работает санитаркой в местном роддоме. Также кроме основной работы она подрабатывает продавщицей на рынке. Муж Барохат болен и нетрудоспособный, поэтому ей приходится самой много работать, чтобы иметь доход в семье. Но того, что она зарабатывает хватает только на проживание. Совсем недавно Барохат с помощью своих детей построила новый небольшой дом. Но сейчас там нужно достроить крышу. Но для этого ей необходимы денежные средства. Поэтому Барохат обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для построения крыши. Барохат надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд  за поддержку.
texts.en: Barohat is a positive and responsible woman.  She is married and has three children.  She lives with her family in a small village, but the house where they live is small and not completely suitable for a good living in it.  She is a very hardworking and caring mother.   Barohat works as an orderly at a local labor and delivery hospital.  Besides the primary job, she also works part-time as a salesperson at a market.  Barohat's husband is ill and unable to work, and this is why she has to work a lot in order to have an income in the family.  However, what she earns is only enough for living expenses.  With the help of her children, Barohat very recently built a new small house, but now she has to complete the roof for it.  She needs money for this.  This is why Barohat came to Arvand and wants to obtain this loan to purchase construction materials for building the roof.  Barohat hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for building the roof for her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cookies, drinks, snacks, etc., thus improving her profits.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
As the married parent of three children, Jean works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle-transport business in the Philippines, and she also earns income from raising pigs and buying and selling charcoal. 

Jean is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Jean has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of  saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to maintain her motorcycle

loans.name: Lidia Abigail

texts.es:
Lidia, disfruta la dicha de ser madre, a pesar que está sacando adelante a sus hijos sola no desmaya en la lucha por tener lo necesario para que a ellos no les falte nada. Vive con sus dos hijos en casa propia. Sus ingresos los genera de su tienda que tiene ubicada en su residencia atiende de 7:00 a. m. A 7:00 p.m., ara ella no es difícil estar pendiente del negocio ni de su familia por el hecho de estar en el mismo lugar.
Comprará azúcar, maíz, frijoles, aceite, detergentes, jabón, golosinas para tener un inventario muy surtido que le aumente sus guanacias, le dé un negocio más rentable y cancelar la deuda.
Para Lidia su sueño es tener un mini súper, en la zona céntrica de la ciudad, darles a sus hijos un estilo diferente al que tienen hoy.
texts.en:
Lidia enjoys being a mother. In spite of having to raise her children alone, she does not lose heart in the struggle to make sure they have everything they need. She lives with her two children in her own house. She makes her money from a store she has in her home. It is open from 7 am until 7 pm. She doesn't find it difficult to care for both the store and her family as they are both in the same place.

Lidia will buy sugar, corn, beans, oil, detergent, soap and sweets to have a greater range of inventory. This will increase her revenues, making her business more profitable and she'll be able to pay off her debt.

Her dream is to own a mini-supermarket in the center of the city, giving her children a different lifestyle from today's.

loans.use: to buy sugar, corn, beans, oil, detergent, soap and sweets.

loans.name: Sara

texts.en:
Sara is a 42-year-old mother of three who opened a mini-market in her neighborhood in 2008. Slowly, slowly, Sara has grown her store, introducing additional products and expanding from a mini-market open part-time to a small grocery store.

Sara needs this loan to further expand stock and purchase new items for her store.

Sara wants to see her store flourish and grow. One day she wants to buy a plot of land and help her children build their homes.

loans.use: To further expand stock and purchase new items for her store.

loans.name: Najib

texts.en:
Najib is 38 years old, married, and has two children, living in Ibb, Yemen. He is a very efficient man because, aside from caring for his family, he likes to work and thus help his family. His business is selling clothes, which has been his sole source of income for over one year. He started his business selling articles of clothing in the market with limited capital.

 At the present time, his business does not make a big profit due to the difficult situation in Yemen. He is requesting a loan from AMB for 200,000 YER, which he will use to purchase articles of clothing such as dresses, shirts, pants, skirts, etc. The loan will give him the opportunity to improve the income from his business. In the future, he would like to open a clothing store to increase his profit. He hopes that all his children will be able to conclude their studies.

loans.use: to purchase articles of clothing such as dresses, shirts, pants, skirts, etc. for his business.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip is a married man and has been blessed with four children. He owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past four years, he has operated a retail shop business, selling household consumables like wheat flour, rice and cooking oil. He cites seasonality as his major challenge in the business. 

He is requesting Kshs 50,000 to boost his kiosk, purchasing bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat and he dreams of expanding to a wholesale shop in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat

loans.name: Lucien

texts.fr: Lucien est un homme de 31 ans,célibataire et père de deux enfants âgés de 10 et 7 ans. Il est commerçant et fait dans la vente en détail des vivres frais(légumes, maniocs, plantains) en fonction des saisons dans un marché de la place depuis 12ans. il a une bonne connaissance des fournisseurs, et surtout de sa clientèle qu'il a acquise au fil du temps grâce à son expérience dans ce domaine. Mais il se retrouve constamment en rupture de stock parce qu'il est obligée de faire écouler tous le stock pour pouvoir s'en procurer à nouveau ceci à cause de la petitesse de son capital.Il souhaiterai augmenter son stock de vivres en achetant en gros ceci augmentera non seulement ses ventes mais aussi son bénéfice. Bénéfice qu'il réinvestira en partie dans son activité pour l'agrandir et le reste lui permettra de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Lucien is a 31-year-old single man.  He has two children who are 10 years old and 7 years old.  

Lucien sells fresh, seasonal produce (vegetables, cassava and plantains) to retail customers, at a local market.  He has run his business for twelve years.  He has a good knowledge of his suppliers and also his customers, who he has built up over his years in business.  However, Lucien often runs out of stock, because he must sell all of his stock before he has enough money to buy further supplies.

Lucien would like to increase his stocks of food products by buying in bulk.  This will increase his sales and also his earnings.  He will use his earnings to reinvest in, and grow, his business, and also to pay the expenses of his family.

loans.use: to buy fruit and fresh produce.

loans.name: Ndèye Khady

texts.fr: Madame Ndèye Khady est une célibataire qui vit avec ses parents. Elle évolue dans le commerce d’arts qu’elle vend aux touristes. Habitant dans une région touristique qui est la région du fleuve Sénégal ; elle a pensé s’activer dans le commerce des œuvres artistiques. Ndèye Khady a une expérience de 2 ans. Elle a besoin de ce crédit pour acheter des cartes postales et des objets d’arts pour la vendre aux touristes. Madame Ndèye Khady  a comme charges les frais de scolarité de ses frères et sœurs ; elle commence sa journée de 7h à 13h pour prendre la pause ensuite elle reprend de 15h jusqu’à 19h du soir. A l’avenir elle souhaite avoir d’autres prêts pour gagner le marché du tourisme dans cette région.
texts.en:
Ndèye Khady is a single woman who lives with her parents.  She sells local artwork to tourists, and decided to do this because she lives in a tourist region near the Senegal river.  She has two years experience in this business.

Ndèye Khady will use her loan to buy postcards and local artwork and resell them to tourists.  She is responsible for the schooling costs of her brothers and sisters.  Ndèye Khady works from 7am until 1pm and, after taking a break, from 3pm until 7pm.  

In the future, she would like to use other loans to develop her tourist business further.

loans.use: to buy artworks for resale.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 37-year-old married father of  two children who has been working at fixing car bodies for eighteen years. In 2005, he started his own business, and since he established it, he is working hard on developing it.

Mahmoud is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to buy a living room set that is necessary for his house, to make his house a good living place for his family members.

He is well known in his domain and working place, with his special experience and the special work he provides to his customers.

loans.use: To buy a living room set for his house

loans.name: Yesid Alejandro

texts.es:
Yesid de 23 años de edad habita en el municipio de Soledad, donde se dedica a la venta de accesorios y repuestos para celulares, desde hace 1 año; él aprendió de su amigo, quien tiene el mismo negocio. Yesid observó que era muy rentable y le había ido muy bien a su amigo. Así fue que cuando le pidió asesoría, para aprender su misma actividad, su amigo no dudó en hacerlo, y también lo conecto con muchos proveedores, para asegurarse que la inversión  de Yesid fuera exitosa. Hoy está ubicado en un local, donde atiende de lunes a sábados, desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche, y sus principales vecinos, se encuentran ubicados en el sector donde tiene su negocio y alrededor de él. 
Su meta es darse a conocer mucho más, y a futuro abrir otro punto de servicios, para generar mayores ingresos. En la actualidad requiere comprar un mayor número de accesorios y repuestos para celulares, y para ello se ha acercado a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, donde está aplicando a un credikiva, su primer crédito en esta organización. Con su credikiva, logrará ampliar el surtido en su local e impulsar su venta, con una oferta adaptada a su gran demanda de final de año, temporada en la cual logrará atraer muchos mas clientes, haciendo de su credikiva una inversión de éxito.
texts.en:
Yesid is 23 years old and lives in the town of Soledad, where for the last year he has earned a living selling accessories and spares for mobile phones. He learnt the business from his friend who has the same business. Yesid saw that it was very profitable and had gone very well for his friend. So when he asked him for help to learn the same business, his friend did not hesitate to help him and also put him in contact with lots of suppliers, to make sure Yesid's investment would be successful. Now he has a shop where he works from Monday to Saturday from 9 in the morning until 9 at night. His main customers are people in the district around his shop and the surrounding area. His challenge is to become much more well-known and in future to open another service centre in order to make more income.

Currently Yesid needs to buy a larger quantity of accessories and spares for mobile phones and so he has approached the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to apply for a Kiva loan. This will be his first loan with this organisation. With his Kiva loan, he will be able to increase the range in his shop and drive his sales, with appropriate stock for the high demand of the year-end. During this season he will be able to attract a lot of customers, making his Kiva loan into a successful investment.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of accessories and spares for mobile phones.

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
Jenelyn is 32 years old and married with four children. She earns a living by farming coconuts in the Philippines. Jenelyn is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of fertilizer .

Jenelyn has been farming coconuts for 10 years and also earns additional income from her general store and from buying and selling bananas.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: buy additional sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Jeanet

texts.en:
Jeanet is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Jeanet is 26 years old and has two children who are in school.

Jeanet has a business selling purified drinking water in the Philippines. Jeanet requested a PHP 9500 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional containers of purified drinking water to sell.

Jeanet has been in this business for three years. In the future, Jeanet would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional containers of purified drinking water for resale

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Jenelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling fish. Jenelyn is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy additional fishing net for her fishing business.

Jenelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 44 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Gloria is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy additional feed for her pigs.

Gloria has been raising pigs for eight years and also earns additional income from buying and selling vegetables.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additonal feed for her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, fish, meat, onions, peppers, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish, pepper, oil, onion, meat, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fish in large quantities to meet customer demand.

loans.name: Ramazon

texts.ru: "Ничто не поздно начать"- сказал Рамазон и смела решил добиться своей поставленной цели. Мужчина на фотографии это Рамазон. Рамазон не смотря на свой возраст (его возраст 49 лет) хочет начать свой первый бизнес. Он будет заниматься  животноводством. Рамазон не боится сложностей и больших перемен. Он выбрал эту деятельность потому, что в Таджикистане благоприятный климат и чистый воздух, что позволит животным развиваться быстрее и здоровыми. Пользуясь благосклонной природой своей страны и опытом работы в этой сфере, Рамазон уверен в своей в своей удаче. Около 3,5 лет, он имеет на скотном дворе 2 коровы, но использовал их для личных нужд. Сейчас Рамазон настроен серьезно, он просит кредит, чтобы купить несколько голов скотов. Кредит берет, потому что начального капитала ему не хватает, ведь такой бизнес требует много средств. Помогите Рамазону! Он нуждается в Вашей помощи!
texts.en: "Nothing is too late to start," said Ramazon and bravely decided to achieve his set goal.  The man on this photograph is Ramazon.  Despite is age (49 years old), Ramazon wants to start his first business.  He will be involved in animal husbandry.  Ramazon is not afraid of difficulties and big changes.  He selected this business because Tajikistan has a favorable climate and clean air, which will allow livestock to grow faster and healthier.  Taking advantage of the favorable nature of his country and work experience in this sphere, Ramazon is confident in his fortune.  He has had 2 cows for about 3.5 years, but used them for his personal needs.  Now Ramazon has serious intentions and requesting this loan to buy several more heads of livestock.  He is requesting this loan because he does not have enough for the starting capital since this business requires a lot of money.  Help Ramazon!  He needs Your help!

loans.use: to buy livestock and start his own business

loans.name: Lemos

texts.en:
Lemos is married with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Lemos is 40 years old and has one child who is in school.

Lemos has a motorcycle transport  business in the Philippines. Lemos requested a PHP 19,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase spare parts for her motorcycle.

Lemos has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Lemos would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her child to college.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for her motorcycle

loans.name: Otar

texts.en:
Otar is 20-years-old and lives in the village of Partskhanakanebi, West Georgia. He is single and lives with his retired grandmother. Otar breeds a milk cow and his grandmother makes cheese with the milk she receives. The cheese is sold locally and this is the only income source for them.
In order to increase his funds, Otar decided to apply for this loan and start a greenhouse business. He is very grateful for the support that the Kiva lenders are offering him.  Thanks to their help he will be able to purchase all the needed materials for his greenhouse construction. He plans to grow various greens in the wintertime and plant tomatoes in the summer. He will sell his harvest during the whole year and generate income. Thanks to this loan, he will improve their quality of life and increase their income. Otar awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase needed materials to construct a greenhouse.

loans.name: Letty

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Letty works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell vegetables business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from motorcycle transport. Letty is borrowing 14,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional vegetables (such as eggplant, carrots, and cabbage) to sell at her buy and sell vegetables business.

Letty has been sustaining her business activities through her past 15 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional vegetables (such as eggplant, carrots, and cabbage) to sell.

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.en:
Leonarda is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Leonarda is 56 years old and has two children who are still in school.

Leonarda has a tailoring  business in the Philippines. She requested a 18,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional materials (such as fabric, threads, needles, and zippers) for her business. Leonarda has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials (such as fabric, threads, needles, and zippers) for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more pepper, salt, rice, onion, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish for her business,

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Jocelyn requested a PHP 6000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, vegetables, spices, rice, etc. for her business.

Jocelyn has been in this business for five years now.

Jocelyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, vegetables, spices, rice, etc. for her business

loans.name: Eltun

texts.en: Eltun is 20 years old and studies at Cooperation University. His studying years are 2011 to 2015 and he is studying management. Eltun's father is an employee in the public sector and he is the only source of income for the family. His father cannot pay the university installments for his son because of their high family expenses. He needs a loan of 2,000 AZN. This loan will help him to pay the university installments for this semester so he can complete his studies. This will insure him a better life in the future.

loans.use: to pay the university installments for this semester.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her existing provision shop capacity.

loans.name: Elnur

texts.en: Elnur is 21 years old and he lives with his parents and two brothers in Baku city. He is a third year student at Cooperation University. Elnur is a good student and reads many books. He is planning to work in his field of study after graduation to help his parents financially. His parents are facing financial problems which are not helping them in paying his study fees. For this reason, he applied for a loan 2,000 AZN. Elnur awaits your support.

loans.use: to pay his study fees.

loans.name: San Jose Group

texts.es:
El comité “San Jose” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la comunidad de Itacuruvi del Rosario de la ciudad de Santaní. Todas ellas son mujeres muy unidas y trabajadoras que están luchando por mejorar su vida y la de su familia. Son de una zona alejada del centro, eminentemente rural que quiere crecer.
Todas se dedican a la actividad rural de la cría de animales, y así están tratando de ayudar a sus familias. Una de ellas, Angelina, pide este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para sus animales, y así poder seguir con la cría de sus animales y seguir luchando por darle a su familia una vida sin privaciones.
texts.en:
The committee known as “San Jose” was formed by several neighbors from the community of Itacuruvi del Rosario in the city of Santaní. All of them are close-knit and hardworking women who are striving to improve their lives and those of their families. They live in a remote area located away from the central part of town that is mostly rural, but is ready for growth. All of the members engage in raising animals so that they can help their families.

One of the members is Angelina. She is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of balanced feed for her animals. This will enable her to continue raising animals and providing a life without hardships for her family.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 21-year-old single man who is responsible for earning the living for four members of his family. He is a hard worker who puts much effort into developing his business to make sure that it will develop properly to cover his family's needs and requests.

Ahmad is acquiring a YOUTH loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to do necessary maintenance on his pick-up. He works in transporting things from one place to another, that's why he has to keep his pick-up in good condition.

He hopes that in the future he'll be capable of buying another truck which will increase his income and develop his living standards.

loans.use: To do the necessary maintenance on his pick-up

loans.name: Rayhona

texts.ru:
Райхона проживает в районе Гиссар и занимается там разведением крупнорогатого скота. Она в основном выращивает коровы молочной породы. Каждый день она сама кормит, поит и доит коровы. Молоко, полученное с коров она использует и для нужд семьи и продает. Райхона занимается этой деятельностью в течение 3 лет. Она получает радость и положительную энергию со своей работы. Райхона замужем, но детей еще не имеет. 
Райхона собирается увеличить поголовье дойных коров в своем скотном дворе. С этой целью она просит кредит для приобретения коровы молочной породы.
texts.en: Rayhona lives in the Gissar district and is involved in breeding cattle there.  She primarily raises dairy cows.  She feeds, gives water and milks cows every day by herself.  She uses the milk obtained from the cows for the family needs and to sell.  Rayhona has been involved in this business for 3 years.  She gets happiness and positive energy from her work.  Rayhona is married, but does not yet have children.  Rayhona plans to increase the headcount of her dairy cows in her livestock yard.  With this goal in mind, she is requesting a loan to buy a dairy cow.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Lyrece

texts.en:
Lyrece is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a restaurant business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to buy additional ingredients like spices, vegetables, meat, fish, etc., for her restaurant business.

Lyrece has been in this business for three years. Lyrece earns other income from a general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she is requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Lyrece has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients, like spices, vegetables, meat, fish, etc

loans.name: Santos Julio

texts.es:
Santos Julio tiene 63 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de La Matanza, su población se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio, es una comunidad extensa con bosques de algarrobo, a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su familia se dedican a la producción y comercialización de plátano, distribuyéndolo en los mercados de la zona.

El ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles para comprar urea y fertilizantes, para abonar su finca, teniendo una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Santos Julio, 63, lives with his wife and children in the La Matanza district.  In this area the residents work in agriculture, animal husbandry, and commerce.  In this community there are expansive carob forests.  It is located 2 hours from the city of Piura on the northern coast of Peru.

Along with his family, Santos grows and sells bananas, distributing them to the markets in the area.

Santos is requesting a loan of 3,000 Peruvian soles to buy urea and fertilizers to fertilize his farm.  This way, he will get a bigger output of crops to sell to his customers.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his fruit farm

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en:
Paulina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell banana business in the Philippines.

Paulina requested a PHP 8000 loan through NWTF to buy more bananas to sell. She has been in this business for seventeen years now.

Paulina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to sell

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is 52 years old and widowed with two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Leonila has a business buying and selling spices in the Philippines. Leonila requested a PHP 9,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional spices to sell to her customers.

Leonila has been in this business for eight years. In the future, Leonila would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional spices to sell to her customers

loans.name: Guliya

texts.ru: Гулие 36 лет, замужем, детей нет. У Гулии - высшее образование, работает преподавателем английского языка в  университете. В качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Гулия занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 7 лет назад, с 30,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Гулии, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 овца, а также земельный надел размером 1,86 ГА, на которой выращивает картофель, кукурузу, ячмень и эспарцет. Ежемесячный доход составляет 14,000 сом (KGS). В целях развития не только полеводства, но и животноводства, Гулия обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Гулия планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Guliya is 36 years old, married and has no children. Guliya has a higher education and works as an English language teacher at a university. To provide additional income for her family, Guliya is involved in animal husbandry and farming, having started 7 years ago with 30,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Guliya's hard work, today her business contains 1 sheep and a 1.86 hectare land plot, where she grows potatoes, corn, barley and sainfoin. The monthly income amounts to 14,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Guliya requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy a cow to increase livestock headcount. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities.

loans.use: to buy a cow to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Rehmat

texts.en:
Rehmat is a 45-year-old married woman. She is a mother of four daughters and four sons. Her husband is a barber by profession. He owns a barber shop in the market which is the only source of income for their family. He is a well skilled person in his profession. All of his customers appreciate his services. 

Rehmat is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband. He will use the loan amount to purchase scissors for hair cutting as well as brushes, combs, and a chair. Rehmat hopes that the loan will be helpful for her husband's shop which is the only source of income for the family. She is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase scissors, brushes, combs, and a chair for her husband's barber shop.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
Tomas, no tiene hijos, es soltero y no recibe ayuda del extranjero. Se dedica a la reparación y mantenimiento de vehículos en su taller, atiende a sus clientes de 7:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m., es un joven que ha prendido a administrar su negocio,  a cubrir sus gastos personales y del negocio.
Solicita crédito para adquirir bujías, baterías, fricciones, y más, así su inventario de repuestos estará equipado para tener a sus clientes satisfechos y evitar que busquen el servicio en otro taller. Espera aumentar su clientela, aumentar sus ingresos, atraer más clientes y pagar sus deudas.
Sueña con tener un taller más rentable, mejorar la infraestructura de su local, y seguir atendiendo a sus clientes como se lo merecen.
texts.en:
Tomas is single, has no children, and receives no support from outside the country.  He has a business repairing and maintaining vehicles in his workshop.  He provides these services to his customers from 7am until 6pm.  He is a young person who has learned to manage his business and cover his personal expenses and those of the business.  

Tomas is requesting a loan to buy spark plugs, batteries, brakes, and other parts.  This way his inventory of spare parts will be sufficient to satisfy his customers, so that he will avoid losing their business to another repair shop.  He is hoping to expand his customer base, increase his income, attract more customers, and pay off his debts.  

Tomas dreams of having a more profitable repair shop, improving the infrastructure of his shop, and continuing to provide his customers with the service they deserve.

loans.use: to buy spark plugs, batteries, brakes, and other parts

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase used clothes for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to add to the float account for her M-pesa money transfer business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more used clothes for her business

loans.name: Varlam

texts.en:
Varlam, age 43, is from Kutaisi city, West Georgia. He is married and has two school-aged children. Varlam’s retired father lives with him as well.

 Varlam is unemployed at the moment and is seeking a job but his attempts have been unsuccessful in spite of his higher education. Varlam’s wife is the only person who makes money in the household. Specifically, she works as a teacher locally and earns nearly $175 per month.

In order to generate funds for his family's well-being, Varlam decided to purchase a car and start a taxi business. He has experience in driving and hopes his business will generate income. He wishes to provide his family members with better living conditions and give them what they need. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy a car and start a taxi business

loans.name: Migna

texts.es:
Migna tienen 35 años, es casada con  Vladimir y tiene 2 hijos que viven en su casa hecha a base de material noble que construyo con mucho esfuerzo. Se dedica junto a Vladimir a la agricultura y producción de cacao y café orgánico, es una  actividad que hace mas de 15 años  fue adoptando hasta convertirla en el principal sustento de su economía familiar. Todas las mañanas desde muy temprano se dirige a sus terrenos en donde desempeña diversas tareas junto a su esposo como deshierbo y abono de las plantaciones con el objetivo de obtener a fin de campaña una producción de calidad que le permita vender sus productos a buen precio. Al hallarse casi al final de su campaña productiva desea contar con capital de respaldo para proceder con la cosecha de sus productos y por ello es necesario contar con el firme apoyo de trabajadores del lugar.
Sus objetivos a largo plazo apuntan a la compra de un vehiculo moto carguero con el cual espera reducir los costes de traslado para sus productos desde sus parcelas hasta los centros de acopio en su localidad.Este es su cuarto préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Desea en esta ocasión contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para la contrata de trabajadores del lugar y proceder dentro de poco con la cosecha de las mazorcas de cacao esperando recuperar el dinero que invirtió en la actual campaña.
texts.en:
Migna is 35 years old, married to Vladimir, and has two children who live in her home constructed of solid materials, and built with lots of effort.  She and Vladimir are farmers and raise cacao and organic coffee and have been doing so for more than 15 years.  They eventually adopted it to become the family’s main source of financial support.  Early every morning, she goes to her farmland, where she and her husband weed and fertilize the crops so that they can have better quality products at good prices.  Because she is nearing the end of her production, she would like to have some working capital so she can hire workers for the harvest.

Her long range objectives are to buy a motor freight vehicle with which she hopes will reduce her transportation costs for her products to the local supply centers.  This will be her fourth Kiva loan and she is grateful for this loan which will allow her to continue moving forward.  She also promises to make her payments on time.  She is asking for a loan of 1,000 New Soles so she can hire local workers and continue little by little with her cacao harvest and recover the money she invested in the current campaign.

loans.use: to pay for labor.

loans.name: Suzette

texts.en:
Suzette works hard to support her family. Suzette is single and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Suzette requested a PHP 9,500 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks and ingredients for her food vending business. Suzette has been in this business for 6 years now and also earns additional income from a general store.

In the future, Suzette would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks and ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fresh fish for her business

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana, who lives with her retired mother in the village of Nikortsminda, is 29 years old and earns a living through clothing sales. Specifically, she goes to Turkey to buy apparel and household items in bulk which she then sells for a profit to her community members. Since there are not many clothing stores in the area, Ana's products enjoy high demand. She is very nice to her customers and does her job with love and care. 

Ana has applied for this loan in order to buy a stock of merchandise at wholesale prices to enlarge her business. She will offer her clients a wide assortment of winter clothing, linens and various household items and give them the option of paying later for their purchases. The loan will enable Ana to earn more profit and save more money to satisfy the everyday needs of her family. She awaits your generosity

loans.use: to buy a stock of clothing and household items for resale

loans.name: José Santos

texts.es:
José de 21 años, se dedicaba a trabajar y estudiar al mismo tiempo, no pudiendo mantener ambas cosas,tuvo que dejar de estudiar y dedicarse solamente a trabajar para tener ingresos y mantenerse. Logro estudiar hasta octavo grado. Se acompaño y tiene un niño de cuatro años con su señora. Su pareja,  se dedica a vender artículos de belleza y le ayuda también en la peluquería donde trabaja él.
 Anteriormente, realizaba actividades agrícolas, desde hace cuatro años se dedica solo al corte de cabello en una peluquería . Este oficio lo aprendió gracias a un amigo, que realizaba esta actividad. El negocio esta a 1km. dee su casa y trabaja toda la semana de 8am a 5pm.
El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar equipo para la peluquería, ya que con la que cuenta esta en mal estado y no les da buen servicio a sus clientes. Ademas, necesita renovar algunas herramientas de trabajo,(tijeras, peines, capa, entre otras). La demanda de este servicio,  en este lugar esta mejorando y hay oportunidades de crecer. Con el crédito podrá contar con capital de inversión, para dar un mejor servicio y obtener mas ingresos.
Sus sueños a futuro, es  poder establecerse bien con el negocio,crecer en clientes y fidelizarlos al negocio.  Así poder generar fuente de empleo, para jóvenes como el que necesitan una oportunidad como la que encontró él con esta actividad.
texts.en:
José, who is 21 years old, was working and studying at the same time. However, he could not keep both going so he had to stop studying and focus solely on working so he could earn an income and support himself. He was able to study as far as eighth grade. He is in a relationship and he and his partner have a four year old boy. His partner earns a living selling beauty products and also helps out in the hairdressing salon where he works. Previously José did agricultural work but for the last four years he has only worked at cutting hair in a hairdresser's. He learnt the trade from a friend who was doing the same work. The business is 1km from his house and he works all week from 8am to 5pm. 

José is asking for the loan to buy equipment for the hairdressing salon, since what he has is in poor condition and his clients do not get a good service. He also needs to replace some hairdressing tools (scissors, combs, capes and other items). The demand for this service in this area is on the increase and there are opportunities for growth. With the loan José will have working capital to provide a better service and generate more income. 

His dream for the future is to firmly establish his business, to increase his clients and build up customer loyalty to his business. By doing this he will be able to provide a source of employment for youngsters like himself who need an opportunity like the one which he found in hairdressing.

loans.use: to buy equipment for the hairdressing salon and replace some hairdressing tools (scissors, combs, capes and other items).

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy chicken feed

loans.name: Musarat

texts.en:
Musarat has applied for a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband's shop. She is a 50-year-old well-educated married woman with two sons and three daughters, living in Lahore, Pakistan. She belongs to a poor class family and fulfills her family's needs with much difficulty. Her husband is a cobbler by profession. He owns small shop near his house.  

He wants the financing to buy leather, rexine, laces, threads, and glue for shoe-making. Musarat is hopeful that the loan will be a productive one. She is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy leather, rexine, laces, threads, and glue for her husband's shoe-making business

loans.name: Ndèye Thiouthiou

texts.fr: Madame Ndèye Thiouthiou est une jeune femme qui habite dans les environs du guichet. Elle est célibataire et n’a aucune charge particulière sinon ses propres besoins. Elle évolue dans le commerce de draps, châles, racines et talismans. Elle demande ce montant pour acheter et revendre des draps, châles, racines et talismans. Elle commence sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 14h de l’après-midi.  Elle souhaite à l’avenir bénéficier de plus de prêts dans l’institution pour devenir le fournisseur en châle surtout pendant la période afin de pouvoir augmenter ses revenus et améliorer sa condition de vie.
texts.en: Mrs. Ndeye Thiouthiou is a young woman living not far from our branch. She is single without dependents; she is just supporting herself. She sells sheets, shawls, root [vegetables] and good luck charms. She is applying for this loan to buy sheets, shawls, root [vegetables] and good luck charms for resale. She starts her work day at 9 AM and finishes at 2 PM. In the future, she would like to take out more loans in order to be able to  become a big shawl supplier, especially in season, in order to increase her revenues and improve her life conditions.

loans.use: to buy shawls, root [vegetables] and good luck charms for resale.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is an industrious man who is ensuring that he provides for himself through the selling of charcoal. The previous loan helped him to buy charcoal to boost his stock. Here again he comes to you requesting a loan of KES 20,000 to buy five sacks of charcoal to sell to earn a living and supplement his income.

loans.use: To purchase five sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Claudia Lourdes

texts.es:
Claudia de 26 años de edad,  estudio hasta octavo grado,dejo los estudios porque tuvo que ayudarle en el comercio a su madre, por ser ella madre soltera, se le dificultaba mantener la familia sin ayuda de otra persona. Ella esta acompañada y su pareja se dedica al lavado de carros, que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Con ellos vive la madre de Claudia y sus dos hermanas y sus dos hijos.
Claudia se dedica a la actividad del comercio, específicamente trabaja con pollo de engorde, ella se encarga de criarlos y engordarlos; su madre los comercializa en un puesto de venta que tiene en el mercado municipal. La granja la tiene  en  su casa,  pero para la venta de estos tiene que viajar 4 km. Hasta el mercado. Ella se ha dedicado desde hace varios años al comercio, pero con el negocio de pollo de engorde desde hace 3 años.
Ella necesita el préstamo para invertir de nuevo, en compra de concentrado y pie de cría, ya que acaba de terminar la producción que tenia y quiere criar y engordar 500 pollos, esto significa que crecerá la cantidad con la que a venido trabajando anteriormente. Esto lo hace, por la razón de que se acerca la época navideña y hay mucha demanda de este producto. Quiere aprovechar la oportunidad que se le presenta.
Desea  establecer una producción escalonada, para tener siempre producto que ofrecer. Que este negocio, se pueda mantener solamente con las ganancias que produce.
texts.en:
Claudia is 26 years old and studied as far as eighth grade. She stopped studying because she had to help her mother in the business, since she is a single mother and it was difficult for her to support the family without help from someone else. Claudia is in a relationship and her partner makes a living washing cars, which is his main source of income. Claudia's mother, her two sisters and their two children live with them. Claudia works in business, specifically in fattening chickens. She is responsible for rearing and fattening them and her mother sells them on her stall in the town's market. Claudia has the chicken farm at her home but has to travel 4 km to the market to sell them. She has been running businesses for several years but has only been running the chicken fattening business for 3 years. 

Claudia needs the loan to make a fresh investment, buying concentrated feed and chicks to rear, since she has just finished the last production which she had and she wants to fatten 500 chickens. This means she will be increasing the quantity above what she has worked with in the past. She is doing this because the Christmas season is approaching and there is a high demand for chickens. She wants to make the most of the opportunity which presents itself. 

Claudia wants to establish a staggered production so that she always has chickens available to sell. She wants to be able to support herself solely with the income from this business.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed and chicks to raise.

loans.name: Sale

texts.fr: Sale est un homme de 27 ans marié.Il est commerçant dans un marché de la place et vend des accessoires de téléphone.Toutefois, il est très souvent confronté à des problèmes de rupture de stocks, d'où la nécessité pour lui d'obtenir ce crédit qui lui permettra d'agrandir son  activité et de réaliser des bénéfices suplémentaires. Bénéfices qui seront en partie réinvestis dans l'activité et le reste lui permettra de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Sale is a 27-year-old married man. He is a marketplace merchant who sells mobile phone accessories. However, he frequently encounters supply problems. This is where the need to obtain a loan arises. This loan will allow him to grow his business and bring in additional profits. These profits will be partly reinvested into his business and the rest will allow him to provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es:
Alexander tiene 29 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y su hijo en el distrito de San Felipe, su población se dedica al cultivo de limón acido y frutales, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la compra venta de combustible, su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio, sus clientes en su mayoría son transportistas que se dirigen a Olmos, Corral Quemado, también tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio que brinda el servicio de soldadura.

Ha solicitado un préstamo 2 000 nuevos soles para comprar un equipo de soldadura para seguir brindando el servicio, y de esta manera seguir generando ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Alexander is 29 years old and lives with his wife and child in the District of San Felipe. His town is known for the cultivation of citrus and other fruits, trade, and livestock breeding. This area is located two hours away from the city of Jaén, which is in the northern mountains of Peru.

Alexander sells fuel. His business is located in his home and most of his customers are vehicle drivers who travel to Olmos and Corral Quemado. He also has a small workshop in his home where he provides welding services.

Alexander is requesting a loan of 2,000 PEN so that he can buy welding equipment, which will allow him to continue offering his services. As a result, he can continue generating additional income for his family.

loans.use: to buy welding equipment.

loans.name: Robina

texts.en:
Robina is 30 years old and married. She operates a beauty parlor, which she has been doing for many years. She offers many facilities to her customers such as makeup, hair styling, and facials.  Over the time she has attained a regular list of customers and earns enough to contribute to the family income. 

Robina needs more customers. She is requesting another loan from Kashf Foundation for 40,000 PKR, which she will use to purchase hair care products, skin products, and bleaching creams in large quantities. She is very experienced in her business and confident that her business will move in a positive direction as a result of the loan investment.

loans.use: to purchase hair care products, skin products, and bleaching creams

loans.name: Toshguloy

texts.ru: Тошгулой пожилая женщина в возрасте 66 лет, проживает в районе Дж.Руми с мужем, сыном и невесткой. Тошгулой несмотря на свой возраст работает. Она является продавщицей на рынке и занимается продажей овощей. Ее невестка недавно научилась профессии швеи у местной портнихи. Однако у нее нет собственной швейной машинки, чтобы принимать заказы на шитье женских платьев. Тошгулой хочет помочь невестке открыть свой швейный бизнес и поэтому запрашивает кредит. Она на сумму кредита купит модернизированную швейную машинку. Невестка Тошгулой будет вышивать за день по одной платье. Этот бизнес прибыльный, так как услуга швеи в Таджикистане всегда востребована. Женщины покупая ткани, шьют себе национальные платья на заказ. Тошгулой верит в успех швейного дела невестки и поэтому собирается помочь.
texts.en: Toshguloy is an elderly 66 year old woman who lives in the J. Rumy region with her husband, son and daughter-in-law.  Despite her age Toshguloy works.  She works at the market and sells vegetables.  Her daughter-in-law recently learned to be a seamstress from a local seamstress.  However, she does not have her own sewing machine in order to take orders for women's dresses.  Toshguloy would like to help her daughter-in-law to open a sewing business and is asking for a loan.  She will use the loan amount to purchase a modern sewing machine.  Toshguloy's daughter-in-law will sew one dress per day.  This is a profitable business because sewing services are always in demand in Tajikistan.  Women purchase fabric and then custom order their traditional dresses.  Toshguloy believes in the success of her daughter-in-law's sewing business and this is why she plans to help her.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her inventory, which will aid her in improving her overall cassava and yam sales.

loans.name: Sagrada Familia Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Sagrada Familia  está en su ciclo número 5 del programa de comité, este grupo es de la ciudad de Concepción, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aún se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona bien rural, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo.
La Sra.  De Las Nieves es una de las integrantes,  ella es la presidenta de este grupo, quien motiva a sus compañeras a poder trabajar y mejorar,  tiene su pequeño negocio de ventas variadas, como también de recepción, globo loco y algunos accesorios para cumpleaños infantiles. Ella es una persona muy emprendedora, que hace todo tipo de trabajo, eso para poder ayudar a su familia y darles lo que necesitan y no tener que pasar por privaciones.
Pide este crédito para la compra de insumos varios para la venta, como aceite, jabones, leche, galletitas y demás. Esta agradecida por esta oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
The group named "Sagrada Familia" (Sacred Family) is in its fifth loan cycle of the committee program. This group is from the city of Concepción, which is located slightly outside the district center and in the middle of a growth period. This area is mostly rural, but the members of the group want to grow and transform the area where they live into a better environment where they can keep growing.

Sra. De Las Nieves is one of the members and the president of the group. She motivates her fellow group members to work and improve. De Las Nieves has a small business where she sells assorted merchandise but she also offers reception supplies, inflatable bouncy houses, and a few accessories for children's parties. She is an enterprising individual who has done all types of work. As a result, she has been able to help her family and provide them with what they need so that they are not deprived.

De Las Nieves is requesting a loan so that she can buy various items to sell such as oil, soap, milk, cookies, and other products. She is grateful for the opportunity she has received.

loans.use: to buy oil, soap, milk, cookies, and other products to sell.

loans.name: Las Triunfadoras De La Ensenada Group

texts.es: El Sr Luis de 69 años es casado y tiene 05 hijos mayores de edad todos independientes. El es socio del grupo “TRIUNFADORAS DE LA ENSENADA”  grupo conformado por 09 integrantes. El Sr. Luis se dedica al comercio, por muchos atiende su bodega donde vende toda clase de productos comestibles son varios años de experiencia en este rubro por lo mismo su clientela es muy asidua y acuden con frecuencia a su negocio. El préstamo que ha solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de productos para su negocio. Su mayor deseo es ampliar su bodega y surtirla de variados productos para obtener mejores ingresos. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por este préstamo. El Sr. Luis  se encuentra en la foto de la izquierda está sentado y viste casaca ploma,  la foto del grupo se tomo e 2 locaciones una parte en la oficina y otra en su localidad.
texts.en:
Luis is 69 years old, married, and has 5 adult children, all of them independent. He belongs to the Triunfadoras de la Ensenada Group, which is composed of 9 members. Luis is dedicated to commerce. Many customers come to his general store where he sells all class of food products. He has various years of experience in this field and his customers are very dependable, visiting his business frequently.
The loan he is requesting will be invested in purchasing merchandise for his business.
Luis' greatest desire is to expand his general store and stock it with a variety of products in order to obtain a better income.
The group is grateful to Kiva investors for this loan. Luis may be seen in the photo seated on the left wearing a lead-colored jacket. The photo of the group was taken in 2 locations, one part in the office and the other in the members' locality.
